content: Txwj thaus puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug mas xyoo kws ob lub ob hlis nub xab ib Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai has tas,
“Koj ca le muab ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee suavdawg nce npe lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, suav cov txwvneej txhua tug tej npe ib tug zuj zug.
Koj hab Aloo ca le suav cov Yixayee txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog, suav ib paab ib paab zuj zug.
Yuav tsum muaj txwvneej huv txhua xeem lug paab koj ib xeem ib tug, yog tug kws nyag ua thawj huv nyag cum.
Cov kws yuav paab koj tej npe yog le nuav, huv xeem Lunpee yog Sente‑aw tug tub Elixu,
huv xeem Xime‑oo yog Xulisantai tug tub Selumi‑ee,
huv xeem Yuta yog Aminanta tug tub Nasoo,
huv xeem Ixakha yog Xu‑a tug tub Nethanee,
huv xeem Xenpuloo yog Heloo tug tub Elia,
huv Yauxej cov tub mas yog huv xeem Efa‑i yog Amihu tug tub Elisama hab huv xeem Manaxe yog Pentaxu tug tub Kamali‑ee,
huv xeem Npeeyamee yog Kinte‑auni tug tub Anpintaa,
huv xeem Ntaaj yog Amisantai tug tub Ahiyexaw,
huv xeem Asaw yog Aukhaa tug tub Paki‑ee,
huv xeem Kas yog Nte‑u‑ee tug tub Eliyaxa,
huv xeem Nathali yog Ena tug tub Ahila.”
Cov nuav yog xaiv huv cov pejxeem lug, yog cov kws nyag ua hlub huv nyag xeem hab nyag ua thawj huv nyag cum huv cov Yixayee.
Mauxe hab Aloo coj cov tuabneeg kws has npe nuav lug,

mas lub ob hlis nub xab ib puab hu cov pejxeem suavdawg tuaj txoos ua ke, tes puab nce npe lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, yog sau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau tej npe ib leeg zuj zug,
lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua lawd. Mauxe txhad le suav puab ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai.

Lunpee kws yog Yixayee tug tub hlub caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le cov txwvneej tej npe kws suav tau ib leeg zuj zug txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Lunpee muaj 46,500 leej.

Xime‑oo caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, txhua tug kws puab suav lawv le cov txwvneej tej npe kws suav tau ib leeg zuj zug, txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Xime‑oo muaj 59,300 leej.
Kas caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Kas muaj 45,650 leej.
Yuta caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Yuta muaj 74,600 leej.
Ixakha caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Ixakha muaj 54,400 leej.
Xenpuloo caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Xenpuloo muaj 57,400 leej.
Yauxej caaj ceg kws yog Efa‑i caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Efa‑i muaj 40,500 leej.
Manaxe caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Manaxe muaj 32,200 leej.
Npeeyamee caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Npeeyamee muaj 35,400 leej.
Ntaaj caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Ntaaj muaj 62,700 leej.
Asaw caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Asaw muaj 41,500 leej.
Nathali caaj ceg lawv le puab tej cum lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg, lawv le tej npe kws suav tau txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw xeem Nathali muaj 53,400 leej.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws Mauxe hab Aloo hab kaum ob tug kws ua hlub sawv cev txhua xeem huv cov Yixayee tau suav ca.
Yog le nuav cov Yixayee suavdawg kws suav tau lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau, yog txhua tug txwvneej huv cov Yixayee kws ua tau tub rog,
mas huvsw muaj 603,550 leej.
Tassws cov Levi tsw raug suav lawv le puab tej cum rua huv.
Tsua qhov Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Xeem Levi mas koj tsw xob suav hab tsw xob muab nce npe rua huv cov Yixayee.

Koj tsuas tsaa cov Levi lug saib Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug hab saib txhua yaam pestwj kws swv hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv lub tsev ntaub. Puab yuav tsum phaaj nqaa Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub hab tej pestwj kws swv hab tu hab saib lub tsev ntaub hab ua tsev ntaub nyob puag ncig Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.
Thaus yuav tshais Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub moog, cov Levi yuav muab lauj hab thaus yuav tsaa Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub cov Levi yuav tsaa. Yog lwm tug txaav ze mas tug hov yuav raug muab tua.
“Cov Yixayee nyag yuav tsaa nyag tsev ntaub nrug nyag cum nyob, nyag nyob nyag ib zog hab nyag nyob ntawm nyag tug chij.

Tassws cov Levi yuav tsaa puab le tsev ntaub nyob puag ncig Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug, sub txujkev chim txhad tsw poob rua ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee. Cov Levi yuav tu hab saib Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug.”
Cov Yixayee kuj ua lawv le hov. Puab ua lawv le kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe lawd txhua yaam huvsw.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Cov Yixayee yuav tsum tsaa tsev ntaub nyag nyob lawv nyag tug chij luj  hab nyob lawv nyag xeem tug chij. Txhua lub tsev ntaub yuav tsum tig qhov rooj ncaaj rua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.”
Cov kws yuav tsaa tsev ntaub rua saab nub tuaj yog cov kws lawv Yuta lub zog tug chij mas nyag nrug nyag paab nyob. Aminanta tug tub Nasoo ua xeem Yuta tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 74,600 leej.
Xeem Ixakha yuav tsaa tsev ntaub nyob txuas moog, Xu‑a tug tub Nethanee ua xeem Ixakha tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 54,400 leej.
Xeem Xenpuloo yuav nyob txuas moog, Heloo tug tub Elia ua xeem Xenpuloo tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 57,400 leej.
Yuta lub zog mas suav txhua paab kws nyob huv huvsw muaj 186,400 leej. Thaus sawv kev moog mas puab yuav ua ntej moog.
Lunpee lub zog tug chij yuav nyob rua saab nraag, mas nyag nrug nyag paab nyob. Sente‑aw tug tub Elixu ua xeem Lunpee tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 46,500 leej.
Xeem Xime‑oo yuav tsaa tsev ntaub nyob txuas moog, Xulisantai tug tub Selumi‑ee ua xeem Xime‑oo tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 59,300 leej.
Xeem Kas yuav nyob txuas moog, Le‑u‑ee  tug tub Eliyaxa ua xeem Kas tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 45,650 leej.
Lunpee lub zog mas suav txhua paab kws nyob huv huvsw muaj 151,450 leej. Thaus sawv kev moog mas puab yuav ua paab kws ob.
Cov Levi yuav phaaj lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb lawv puab qaab moog rua nruab nraab. Puab nyag moog lawv le nyag nyob, nyag lawv nyag tug chij moog.
Efa‑i lub zog tug chij yuav tsum nyob rua saab nub poob mas nyag nrug nyag paab nyob, Amihu tug tub Elisama ua xeem Efa‑i tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 40,500 leej.
Xeem Manaxe yuav nyob txuas moog, Pentaxu tug tub Kamali‑ee ua xeem Manaxe tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 32,200 leej.
Xeem Npeeyamee yuav nyob txuas moog, Kinte‑auni tug tub Anpintaa ua xeem Npeeyamee tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 35,400 leej.
Efa‑i lub zog mas suav txhua paab kws nyob huv huvsw muaj 108,100 leej. Thaus sawv kev moog mas puab yuav ua paab kws peb.
Ntaaj lub zog tug chij yuav nyob rua saab peg, mas nyag nrug nyag paab nyob, Amisantai tug tub Ahiyexaw ua xeem Ntaaj tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 62,700 leej.
Xeem Asaw yuav tsaa tsev ntaub nyob txuas moog, Aukhaa tug tub Paki‑ee ua xeem Asaw tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 41,500 leej.
Xeem Nathali yuav nyob txuas moog, Ena tug tub Ahila ua xeem Nathali tug thawj.
Nwg cov pejxeem kws suav ca nuav muaj 53,400 leej.
Ntaaj lub zog mas suav huvsw muaj 157,600 leej. Thaus sawv kev moog puab yuav ua paab kws moog tom qaab hlo, nyag lawv nyag tug chij moog.
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov Yixayee kws suav lawv le cov quas xeem. Cov zog huvsw kws suav lawv le cov quas paab muaj 603,550 leej.
Tassws tsw suav cov Levi rua huv cov Yixayee, lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe lawd.
Cov Yixayee ua lawv le hov. Puab ua zog nyag nyob lawv nyag tug chij hab tsua sawv kev moog nyag nrug nyag xeem nyag nrug nyag cum ua ke moog, lawv le txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe lawd.
Ntawm nuav moog yog Aloo hab Mauxe caaj ceg, yog ncua swjhawm kws Yawmsaub nrug Mauxe has lug sau lub roob Xinai.
Aloo cov tub le npe muaj le nuav, Nanta yog tug tub hlub, hab Anpihu, Ele‑axa hab Ithama.
Cov nuav yog Aloo cov tub kws muab roj ywg tsaa ua pov thawj tej npe, yog cov kws nwg tsaa lug ua pov thawj le num.

Tassws Nanta hab Anpihu tuag rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag rua thaus kws ob tug muab tej suavtawg kws tsw dawb huv  coj lug xyeem ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai, hab ob tug kuj tsw muaj mivnyuas. Vem le nuav Ele‑axa hab Ithama txhad ua pov thawj teg num rua thaus Aloo kws yog ob tug txwv tseed muaj txujsa nyob.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le coj xeem Levi lug ze hab ca puab nyob ntawm tug pov thawj Aloo xubndag kuas puab paab Aloo ua num.
Puab yuav ua num paab Aloo hab ua num rua cov pejxeem suavdawg ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb rua thaus kws puab ua koom ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.
Puab yuav tu hab saib tej pestwj swv huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb txhua yaam huvsw hab yuav ua num rua cov Yixayee rua thaus puab paab ua koom ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.
Ca le muab cov Levi pub rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub, puab yog cov kws muab pub hlo rua Aloo huv cov Yixayee.
Ca le tsaa Aloo hab nwg cov tub ua pov thawj teg num. Tassws yog lwm tug txaav lug ze mas nwg yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Saib maj, kuv tub muab cov Levi rhu huv cov Yixayee lug theej cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub kws yug huv plaab lug. Cov Levi yuav tsum ua kuv tug.

Tsua qhov txhua tug tub hlub yeej yog kuv tug. Nub kws kuv tau tua tej tub hlub huvsw huv Iyi tebchaws hov kuv tub cais cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub tsw has tuabneeg le hab tsaj txhu le kuas dawb huv rua kuv. Puab yeej yuav ua kuv tug, kuv yog Yawmsaub.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai tas,
“Ca le suav cov Levi lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg. Koj yuav tsum suav txhua tug txwvneej kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau.”
Mauxe kuj suav puab lawv le kws Yawmsaub has kuas nwg ua.
Nuav yog Levi tej tub le npe, Kwsoo, Khauha hab Melali.
Nuav yog Kwsoo tej tub le npe lawv le puab cum, yog Lini hab Sime‑i.
Khauha cov tub lawv le puab cum yog Alaav, Ixaha, Heploo hab Uxi‑ee.
Melali cov tub lawv le puab cum yog Mali hab Musi. Cov nuav yog cov Levi tsev tuabneeg lawv le puab cum.
Kwsoo ceg muaj cum Lini hab cum Sime‑i, ob cum nuav yog Kwsoo ceg.
Suav taag nrho cov txwvneej kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau huvsw mas muaj 7,500 leej.
Kwsoo ceg cov quas cum hov yuav tsaa tsev ntaub rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub saab nub poob,
mas La‑ee tug tub Eliyaxa ua Kwsoo ceg tug thawj.
Tej kws Kwsoo ceg yuav tsum saib ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb yog Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, yog lub tsev ntaub hab tej daim ntaub vuv hab daim ntaub ua qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
hab tej daim ntaub xov laj kaab hab daim ntaub ua rooj vaag kws xov puag ncig Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub hab lub thaaj, hab tej hlua hab txhua yaam kws swv rua tej nuav.
Khauha ceg muaj cum Alaav hab cum Ixaha hab cum Heploo hab cum Uxi‑ee. Cov cum nuav yog Khauha ceg.
Suav taag nrho cov txwvneej kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau huvsw mas muaj 8,600 leej kws saib num ntawm lub chaw pe Yawmsaub.
Khauha cov tub le cum nuav yuav tsaa tsev ntaub rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub saab nraag,
mas Uxi‑ee tug tub Elixafa ua Khauha ceg cov quas cum tug thawj.

Tej kws puab yuav tsum saib yog lub swb xaab, lub rooj, lub teeb, ob lub thaaj, tej pestwj kws cov pov thawj swv huv lub tsev pe Yawmsaub hab daim ntaub kws thaiv, hab txhua yaam kws swv rua tej nuav.
Pov thawj Aloo tug tub Ele‑axa yuav ua tug thawj kws saib cov thawj huv cov Levi hov hab saib cov kws tu lub tsev pe Yawmsaub.
Melali ceg muaj cum Mali hab cum Musi, ob cum nuav yog Melali ceg.
Suav cov txwvneej taag nrho huvsw kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau huvsw mas muaj 6,200 leej.
Anpiha‑i tug tub Xuli‑ee ua Melali ceg cov quas cum tug thawj. Puab yuav tsaa tsev ntaub rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub saab peg.
Tej num kws muab rua Melali ceg ua yog saib tej txag taab ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, tej laag, tej ncej, tej taw tag ncej hab tej cuab yeej cuab xwm hab txhua yaam kws swv rua tej nuav,
hab tej ncej laj kaab kws xov puag ncig, tej taw tag ncej, tej tswg hab tej hlua.

Cov kws yuav tsaa tsev ntaub ncaaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub lub qhov rooj kws yog saab nub tuaj mas yog Mauxe hab Aloo hab Aloo cov tub. Puab le num yog saib tej kevcai huv lub tsev pe Yawmsaub, yog saib txhua yaam num kws yuav ua rua cov Yixayee. Yog lwm tug txaav lug ze mas yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.

Cov tuabneeg kws suav rua huv cov Levi kws Mauxe hab Aloo tau suav lawv le Yawmsaub has mas cov txwvneej lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau huvsw muaj 22,000 leej.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le suav cov Yixayee tej tub hlub txhua tug kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau mas muab nce npe ca huvsw.
Koj yuav tsum muab cov Levi rhu lug rua kuv theej cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub. Kuv yog Yawmsaub. Hab yuav muab cov Levi tej tsaj lug theej cov Yixayee thawj tug mivnyuas tsaj txhua tug huvsw.”
Yog le nuav Mauxe txhad suav cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub, lawv le Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe ua lawd.
Cov tub hlub kws suav tau lawv le tej npe kws noob nyoog muaj ib hlis rov sau huvsw muaj 22,273 leeg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le muab cov Levi lug theej cov Yixayee tej tub hlub huvsw, hab muab cov Levi tej tsaj theej cov Yixayee tej tsaj. Cov Levi yuav yog kuv tug, kuv yog Yawmsaub.
Qhov kws yuav txhwv cov Yixayee tej tub hlub 273 leeg kws tub yog tshaaj cov txwvneej Levi lawm,
mas yuav sau ib leeg tswb sekhee nyaj  lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ib sekhee muaj neeg nkaum kela, mas koj yuav sau tej nyaj hov ca,
muab cov nyaj kws txhwv tej tub hlub kws tshaaj hov pub rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub.”
Mauxe txhad sau tej nyaj kws txhwv ntawm tej tub hlub kws tshaaj cov kws cov Levi tub txhwv lawm,
yog sau cov Yixayee tej tub hlub le nyaj, mas huvsw muaj 1,365 sekhee nyaj  lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub,
hab Mauxe muab cov nyaj txhwv hov rua Aloo hab Aloo cov tub lawv le Yawmsaub tej lug kws nwg kuas Mauxe ua.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Ca le muab Khauha ceg kws yog xeem Levi nce npe lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg,
nce npe cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Nuav yog tej num kws Khauha ceg ua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, yog saib tej yaam kws dawb huv kawg nkaus.
“Thaus yuav tshais chaw moog mas Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav nkaag moog mas yuav rhu daim ntaub kws thaiv coj lug kauv lub swb xaab kws ntim Yawmsaub tej lug,
hab puab yuav muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv kauv hab muab ib daim ntaub xav kauv tuaj txheej sau mas ntxwg laag kwv.

Hab puab yuav muab ib daim ntaub xav pua sau lub rooj kws txawb ncuav rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab muab tej taig plab taig ntim kws rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab, hab taig phaaj hab tej laam fwj kws laub cawv txwv maab xyeem txawb rua sau, hab muab cov ncuav kws naj nub xyeem ib txhws le tso rua sau,
mas yuav muab ib daim ntaub lab lug kauv hab muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug kauv rua sau hab ntxwg tej laag kwv.
Puab yuav muab ib daim ntaub xav lug kauv tug kaav teeb hab tej teeb, tej raab txab kws txav teeb xeeb hab tej phaaj plab hab tej laam fwj roj saam teeb,
hab yuav muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv qhwv lub teeb hab tej pestwj kws swv huvsw hab muab txawb rua sau lub txaaj kwv.
Puab yuav muab ib daim ntaub xav kauv lub thaaj kub hab muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug kauv es ntxwg laag kwv.
Puab yuav muab ib daim ntaub xav qhwv tej pestwj kws swv ua num rua huv lub tsev pe Yawmsaub huvsw hab muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug kauv hab muab txawb rua sau lub txaaj kwv.
Puab yuav muab cov tshauv ntawm lub thaaj yawm pov tseg hab muab ib daim ntaub yimlaaj kauv lub thaaj.

Puab yuav muab tej pestwj kws swv ntawm lub thaaj txawb rua sau, yog tej kws swv ua num, yog tej yag rau ncaig tawg, tej nqai lauj nqai nqaj, tej duav phuaj, hab tej phaaj, yog txhua yaam pestwj kws swv ntawm lub thaaj. Puab yuav muab tawv ntshuab havtxwv lug kauv huvsw hab ntxwg laag kwv.

“Thaus Aloo hab nwg cov tub kauv lub tsev pe Yawmsaub hab tej pestwj kws swv huv lub tsev pe Yawmsaub huvsw taag lawd mas thaus kws puab yuav sawv kev moog tes Khauha ceg yuav lug kwv tej nuav, tassws puab kov tsw nyog tej kws dawb huv nuav le tsaam tes puab tuag. Tej nuav yog tej kws nyob huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb mas Khauha ceg yuav tsum kwv.

“Pov thawj Aloo tug tub Ele‑axa yuav tsum saib tej roj kws saam lub teeb hab tej moov tshuaj tsw qaab hab tej kws naj nub xyeem ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej roj kws swv ua kevcai, hab nwg yuav saib taag nrho Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv, yog lub tsev pe Yawmsaub hab tej pestwj kws swv rua huv.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Tsw xob ca Khauha ceg cov quas cum raug kev puam tsuaj taag huv cov Levi moog,

tassws meb yuav tsum ua le nuav sub puab txhad muaj txujsa nyob hab tsw tuag rua lub swjhawm kws puab txaav lug ze tej hov txhua chaw dawb huv kawg nkaus nuav. Aloo hab nwg cov tub yuav nkaag moog feeb num feeb nraa rua puab,
kuas tsw xob kheev puab nkaag moog xauj tej kws dawb huv txawm yog tuab ntsais muag xwb los puab yuav tuag le.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le suav Kwsoo ceg nce npe lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tsev tuabneeg.
Koj yuav suav cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, yog txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Nuav yog Kwsoo ceg cov quas cum le daag num, yog paab teg paab taw hab kwv nraa.

Puab yuav thauj tej ntaub kws ua Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, hab lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab daim ntaub kws vuv hab daim tawv ntshuab havtxwv kws vuv txheej sau hab daim ntaub kws ua qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb,

hab tej ntaub kws xov laj kaab puag ncig Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub hab lub thaaj, hab daim ntaub ua rooj vaag, hab tej hlua hab tej pestwj kws swv huvsw. Puab yuav ua txhua yaam num kws ntswg txug tej nuav.
Txhua yaam num kws Kwsoo ceg ua mas Aloo hab Aloo cov tub feeb rua puab ua hab puab thauj. Koj yuav tsum qha txhua yaam kws yog puab le feem thauj rua puab thauj.
Nuav yog tej num kws Kwsoo ceg cov quas cum ua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb. Pov thawj Aloo tug tub Ithama ua tug saib puab tej daag num.
“Ca le suav Melali ceg lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg.
Koj yuav suav cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, yog txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Nuav yog tej kws puab yuav tsum thauj, yog puab tej daag num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, mas yog tej txag taab xov lub tsev ntaub, tej laag, tej ncej hab tej taw ncej,
hab tej ncej laj kaab kws xov puag ncig hab tej taw tag ncej, tej tswg, tej hlua hab tej pestwj hab txhua yaam kws swv. Koj yuav tsum feeb num qha txhua yaam rua puab thauj.
Nuav yog tej num kws Melali ceg cov quas cum ua, yog txhua yaam num kws puab ua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, pov thawj Aloo tug tub Ithama yog tug kws kuas ua tej num hov.”
Mauxe hab Aloo hab cov kws ua hlub huv cov pejxeem txawm suav Khauha ceg cov quas cum lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg,
suav cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, yog txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
mas suav cov quas cum hov huvsw muaj 2,750 leej.
Nuav yog cov kws suav tau huv Khauha ceg cov quas cum, yog txhua tug kws ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb kws Mauxe hab Aloo tau suav lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua lawd.
Cov tuabneeg huv Kwsoo ceg lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg,
cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, yog txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
mas suav lawv le tej cum hab lawv le tej tsev tuabneeg huvsw muaj 2,630 leej.
Nuav yog Kwsoo ceg cov quas cum, yog txhua tug kws ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb kws Mauxe hab Aloo tau suav lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua lawd.
Cov tuabneeg huv Melali ceg lawv le puab tej cum hab lawv le puab tej tsev tuabneeg
cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, yog txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
mas suav cov quas cum huvsw muaj 3,200 leej.
Nuav yog cov kws suav huv Melali cov tub tej cum kws Mauxe hab Aloo tau suav lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe lawd.
Txhua tug kws suav tau huv cov Levi, kws Mauxe hab Aloo hab cov kws ua hlub huv cov Yixayee tau suav lawv le tej cum hab lawv le tej tsev tuabneeg,
cov kws noob nyoog muaj peb caug xyoo txug tswb caug xyoo, txhua tug kws txawj ua num es yuav ua tau num hab kwv tau nraa rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
mas cov kws suav tau hov muaj 8,580 leej.
Puab raug tsaa ua num lawv le Yawmsaub tau has rua Mauxe lawd, txhua tug nyag ua nyag num hab nyag kwv nyag nraa. Yog le nuav Mauxe txhad tau suav puab lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua lawd.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee kuas puab muab txhua tug kws mob lis mob ruas hab txhua tug kws muaj kua ndwg hab txhua tug kws qas tsw huv vem kov tej cev tuag lawv kuas tawm huv lub zog moog.
Txawm yog txwvneej quaspuj los koj yuav muab lawv kuas tawm huv lub zog moog, sub txhad tsw puag tsuas puab lub zog kws kuv nyob huv plawv puab qas tsw huv.”
Cov Yixayee kuj ua le hov txhad lawv kuas puab tawm huv lub zog moog. Yawmsaub has le caag rua Mauxe cov Yixayee kuj ua lawv nraim le hov.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, thaus txwvneej los xwj quaspuj los xwj ua txhum ib yaam daabtsw lawv le tuabneeg pheej ua, kws yog ua tsw ncaaj rua Yawmsaub, mas nwg ua txhum muaj txem.
Tug hov yuav tsum leeg tej kev txhum kws nwg tau ua hab nwg yuav tsum thim kuas txwm nkaus le qub hab ntxwv ib feem tswb rua tug kws nwg tau ua txhum hov.

Yog tug hov tsw muaj kwvtij kws yuav txais tej kws thim rov lug hov, kuj muab tej kws thim hov xyeem rua Yawmsaub es pub rua tug pov thawj nrug tug txwv yaaj kws ntxuav kev txhum xyeem ua kevcai ntxuav nwg kev txhum ua ke.
Txhua yaam dawb huv kws cov Yixayee coj lug xyeem es pub rua tug pov thawj mas yuav poob ua cov pov thawj le feem.
Tej dawb huv kws cov pejxeem pub yog cov pejxeem le feem, tassws txhua yaam kws puab xyeem pub rua cov pov thawj lawm yog cov pov thawj le feem.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Yog leejtwg tug quaspuj yuam kev moog ua pleeg ua yig

es muaj lwm tug txwvneej tuaj nrug tug quaspuj hov pw ua ke tassws tug quasyawg tsw pum, txawm yog nwg ua phem ua qas lawm es tsw muaj leejtwg paub hab tsw muaj leejtwg ua tau timkhawv vem nteg tsw tau ntawm chaw,
tes lub nam sab khib lug tshoov tug quasyawg nwg txhad le khib sab heev, nwg tug quaspuj ua txhum hab tsw ua los nwg txhad le khib,

ca tug quasyawg hov coj nwg tug quaspuj moog cuag tug pov thawj hab coj tej kws yuav xyeem ua kevcai rua nwg quaspuj moog hab, yog ib feem kaum huv ib efa  moov qeb. Nwg tsw xob laub roj hab muab roj ntoos tsw qaab tso rua sau cov moov hov vem yog tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos daws kev sws khib, yog xyeem ua kevcai ncu kuas ncu tau tej kev txhum.
“ ‘Tug pov thawj yuav coj tug quaspuj lug nyob rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag,
mas tug pov thawj yuav muab cov dej dawb huv kws nyob huv taig aav hab muab mivntswv moov aav huv Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub tso rua huv cov dej hov.

Tug pov thawj yuav coj tug quaspuj lug nyob ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab daws txuj hlua kws paav plaubhau hab muab tej kws xyeem ua kevcai ncu tso rua huv tug quaspuj hov txhais teg, yog tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos daws kev sws khib. Mas tug pov thawj yuav nqaa cov dej ab dej daw kws tsawm foom hov huv nwg txhais teg.

Hab tug pov thawj yuav kuas tug quaspuj hov twv has tas, “Yog tsw muaj tug txwvneej twg nrug koj pw lossws koj tsw tau ntxeev sab moog ua phem ua qas rua thaus koj tseed nyob huv koj tug quasyawg kev tswjfwm, kuj ca koj dim cov dej ab dej daw kws tsawm foom nuav.
Tassws yog koj tau yuam kev rua thaus koj tseed nyob huv koj tug quasyawg kev tswjfwm moog ua phem ua qas es muaj dua lwm tug kws tsw yog koj quasyawg nrug koj pw ua ke,”

(mas ca tug pov thawj coj tug quaspuj hov has tej lug tsawm foom hab has rua tug quaspuj tas) “Thov Yawmsaub ua kuas koj raug lug tsawm foom hab thov ca koj lub npe ua ib lu lug tsawm foom rua huv koj haiv tuabneeg rua thaus Yawmsaub ua rua koj ncej qaab qhuav hab ua rua koj lub plaab zaig.
Thov kuas cov dej kws tsawm foom nuav nkaag rua huv koj lub cev ua kuas koj lub plaab zaig hab ua rua koj ncej qaab qhuav.” Mas tug quaspuj hov yuav tsum has tas “Amee, Amee.”
“ ‘Mas tug pov thawj yuav sau tej lug tsawm foom nuav rua huv ntawv hab muab cov npe ntawv hov so ntxuav rua huv taig dej ab dej daw,
hab kuas tug quaspuj hov haus cov dej ab dej daw kws tsawm foom mas cov dej kws tsawm foom hov yuav nkaag rua huv nwg lub cev ua rua nwg mob kawg le.
Tes tug pov thawj yuav muab tej moov kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos daws kev sws khib huv tug quaspuj txhais teg cev xyeem ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab coj moog rua ntawm lub thaaj.
Tug pov thawj yuav tsuab ib taus moov kws xyeem hov ua lub chaw rua Yawmsaub ncu ntsoov hab muab hlawv rua sau lub thaaj hab kuas tug quaspuj haus cov dej hov.

Thaus kuas nwg haus cov dej hov lawd, mas yog nwg tau ua phem ua qas moog deev hluas nraug lawm mas cov dej kws tsawm foom hov yuav nkaag rua huv nwg lub cev ua rua nwg mob heev hab nwg lub plaab yuav zaig hab nwg ncej qaab yuav qhuav. Tes tug quaspuj lub npe yuav ua ib lu lug tsawm foom rua huv nwg haiv tuabneeg.
Tassws yog tug quaspuj hov tsw tau ua phem ua qas nwg yeej dawb huv mas nwg yuav dim hab yuav xeeb taug mivnyuas.
“ ‘Nuav yog tej kevcai ntswg txug kev sws khib, thaus tug quaspuj tseed nyob huv nwg tug quasyawg kev tswjfwm es tau yuam kev ua phem ua qas,

lossws thaus lub sab khib tshoov tug quasyawg, nwg khib nwg quaspuj heev. Nwg yuav coj nwg tug quaspuj nyob rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, mas tug pov thawj yuav ua rua tug quaspuj lawv le kevcai nuav txhua qhov huvsw.
Tug quasyawg yuav dim kev txhum tassws tug quaspuj yuav rws nwg lub txem.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus tug txwvneej twg lossws tug puj twg tau cog lug tawv tseg ca, yog cog lug ua Naxi muab nwg tug kheej cais pub rua Yawmsaub,

nwg yuav tsum caiv cawv txwv maab hab cawv ntxws. Nwg tsw xob haus tej dej qaub kws muab cawv txwv maab lossws cawv ntxws lug ua, hab tsw xob haus kua txwv maab lossws noj cov txwv maab tsw has cov nyoog los cov qhuav.
Lub swjhawm kws nwg muab nwg tug kheej cais hov, nwg tsw xob noj tsob txwv maab ib yaam daabtsw, txawm yog lub noob txwv lossws daim tawv txwv kuj tsw xob noj.

“ ‘Lub swjhawm kws nwg cog lug tseg cais nwg tug kheej hov, tsw xob kheev raab chais lug nphaav nwg taubhau. Nwg yuav tsum dawb huv moog txug thaus taag lub swjhawm kws teem ca cais nwg tug kheej rua Yawmsaub. Nwg yuav tsum tseg nwg plaubhau ntev.
“ ‘Lub swjhawm kws nwg cais nwg tug kheej rua Yawmsaub hov, nwg tsw xob moog ze tej cev tuag.
Txawm yog nwg nam nwg txwv nwg kwvtij nkauj muam tuag los nwg tsw xob ua rua nwg qas tsw huv tsua qhov lub hom thawj kws nwg muab nwg cais rua Vaajtswv nyob sau nwg taubhau.
Taag lub swjhawm kws nwg cais nwg tug kheej hov yog nwg dawb huv rua Yawmsaub.
“ ‘Yog muaj tuabneeg ca le tuag kag ze nwg taamswm mas ua rua nwg lub taubhau kws dawb huv lawm qas tsw huv, tes puv xyaa nub nwg yuav tsum chais nwg taubhau rua nub kws ua kevcai ntxuav.
Nub kws yim nwg yuav coj ob tug nquab taug lossws ob tug rhaws nquab nyeg moog rua tug pov thawj ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb.

Tug pov thawj yuav muab ib tug xyeem ua kevcai daws txem muab ib tug xyeem ua kevcai hlawv xyeem ntxuav kev txhum tsua qhov nwg ua txhum qhov kws nyob ze tug tuag. Hab nub ntawd nwg yuav tsum tu nwg lub taubhau kuas dawb huv dua ib zag.

Hab nwg yuav rov muab nwg tug kheej cais rua Yawmsaub kuas taag lub swjhawm kws teem ca. Nwg yuav coj ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tuaj ua kevcai ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum. Lub swjhawm ua ntej hov mas tsw xaam lawm vem qhov kws nwg cog lug cais nwg tug kheej hov tub qas tsw huv lawm.
“ ‘Nuav yog tej kevcai kws thaus tug Naxi cais nwg tug kheej puv swjhawm. Yuav tsum coj nwg moog rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb.

Nwg yuav coj tej kws xyeem rua Yawmsaub tuaj, yog ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ib tug mivnyuas maum yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj ua kevcai xyeem daws txem hab ib tug txwv yaaj kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo,
hab ib tawb ncuav tsw xyaw keeb kws muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj ua, hab tej daim ncuav tsw xyaw keeb pleev roj hab tej kws xyeem ua ke ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab ua kevcai laub xyeem.
“ ‘Mas tug pov thawj yuav coj tej nuav tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag hab yuav xyeem tug tsaj kws ua kevcai daws txem hab tug tsaj kws ua kevcai hlawv xyeem.

Nwg yuav muab tug txwv yaaj hab lub tawb ncuav tsw xyaw keeb xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai sws raug zoo. Hab tug pov thawj yuav muab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej kws ua kevcai laub xyeem xyeem ua ke.

“ ‘Mas tug kws ua Naxi yuav chais nwg lub taubhau kws tu kuas dawb huv hov ntawm qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab yuav coj cov plaubhau ntawm nwg lub taubhau kws dawb huv hov moog tso rua sau cub tawg kws nyob huv qaab tej kws xyeem ua kevcai sws raug zoo.

Thaus tug kws ua Naxi chais cov plaubhau kws nwg tu kuas dawb huv lawm, tug pov thawj yuav coj tug txwv yaaj ib ceg teg kws hau lawm nrug ib lub ncuav tsw xyaw keeb hab ib daim ncuav tsw xyaw keeb huv lub tawb lug tso rua tug kws ua Naxi txhais teg.

Mas tug pov thawj muab tej hov cev rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag ua kevcai cev xyeem. Tej hov yog tug pov thawj le feem kws dawb huv ua ke nrug lub hauv nrob kws cev xyeem lawm hab ceg qaab kws xyeem lawm. Dhau nuav tug kws ua Naxi txhad haus tau cawv.

“ ‘Nuav yog tej kevcai rua tug kws cog lug tseg ua Naxi. Tej kws nwg muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub yuav tsum xyeem lawv le tej kws teem rua tug kws cais nwg tug kheej tassws yog xyeem tau ntau dua tej kws teem ca kuj tau. Nwg yuav tsum xyeem lawv le nwg tub cog lug tseg. Ua le hov nwg txhad ua tau lawv le txuj kevcai kws cais nwg tug kheej ua Naxi.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua Aloo hab nwg cov tub tas, ‘Mej yuav tsum foom koob moov rua cov Yixayee le nuav. Mej yuav has tas,
“ ‘Thov Yawmsaub foom koob moov rua mej hab tsom kaav tsom kwm mej.
Thov Yawmsaub lub ntsej muag ci ntsaa ab rua mej hab hlub mej.
Thov Yawmsaub tsaa qhov muag saib mej hab pub kev kaaj sab quas lug rua mej.’
“Ua le nuav puab txhad tuav kuv lub npe foom koob moov rua cov Yixayee mas kuv yuav foom koob moov rua puab.”

Nub kws Mauxe tsaa Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub tav hab tau ua kevcai laub roj ywg lub tsev ntaub hab txhua yaam kws nyob huv, tu kuas dawb huv, hab tau laub roj ywg lub thaaj hab tej pestwj kws swv huvsw tu kuas dawb huv rua Yawmsaub lawm,
mas cov kws ua hlub huv cov Yixayee, yog tej tsev tuabneeg tug thawj, yog cov kws ua hlub huv cov quas xeem kws saib cov kws suav ca lawd,

puab coj hov txhua chaw tuaj xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, yog rau lub tsheb nyuj kws muaj ntaub kauv hab kaum ob tug nyuj, ob tug kws ua hlub coj ib lub tsheb hab ib leeg coj ib tug nyuj tuaj xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le txais tej nuav ntawm puab sub txhad tau swv ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, hab ca le muab rua cov Levi txhua tug lawv le puab teg num kws puab ua.”
Mauxe txhad le txais tej tsheb nyuj hab tej nyuj muab rua cov Levi.
Nwg muab ob lub tsheb hab ob nkawm nyuj rua Kwsoo ceg lawv le puab tej num.
Nwg muab plaub lub tsheb hab plaub nkawm nyuj rua Melali ceg lawv le puab tej num kws pov thawj Aloo tug tub Ithama qha kuas puab ua.
Tassws nwg tsw muab daabtsw rua Khauha ceg vem puab tej num yog tej yaam kws dawb huv kws yuav tsum kwv xwb.

Hab cov kws ua hlub muab hov txhua chaw xyeem ua kevcai pub lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub rua nub kws ua kevcai muab roj laub ywg lub thaaj hov. Cov kws ua hlub nyag taug nyag xyeem hov txhua chaw ntawm lub thaaj.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Cov kws ua hlub ib leeg yuav tsum tuaj xyeem ib nub ua kevcai pub lub thaaj rua kuv.”
Tug kws muab hov txhua chaw xyeem thawj nub yog Aminanta tug tub Nasoo kws yog xeem Yuta.

Yaam kws nwg muab xyeem yog muab ib lub taig plab kws yog nyaj nyaav 130 sekhee,  ib lub phaaj kws yog nyaj nyaav 70 sekhee  nyaav lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ob lub puavleej muaj moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj puv nkaus huv ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab muab ib lub taig kws yog kub nyaav kaum sekhee  muaj cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv,
hab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj hab ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem,
ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Aminanta tug tub Nasoo muab xyeem.
Nub kws ob Xu‑a tug tub Nethanee kws ua xeem Ixakha tug thawj muab hov txhua chaw tuaj xyeem.

Tej kws nwg muab xyeem, yog muab ib lub taig plab kws yog nyaj nyaav 130 sekhee, ib lub phaaj kws yog nyaj nyaav 70 sekhee nyaav lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ob lub puavleej muaj moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj puv nkaus huv ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab muab ib lub taig kws yog kub nyaav kaum sekhee muaj cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv,
hab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj hab ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem,
ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Xu‑a tug tub Nethanee muab xyeem.
Nub kws peb Heloo tug tub Elia kws ua xeem Xenpuloo tug thawj

muab tej nuav xyeem, muab ib lub taig plab kws yog nyaj nyaav 130 sekhee, ib lub phaaj kws yog nyaj nyaav 70 sekhee nyaav lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ob lub puavleej muaj moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj puv nkaus huv ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab muab ib lub taig kws yog kub nyaav kaum sekhee muaj cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv,
hab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj hab ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem,
ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Heloo tug tub Elia muab xyeem.
Nub kws plaub Sente‑aw tug tub Elixu kws ua xeem Lunpee tug thawj

hab muab ib lub taig kws yog kub nyaav kaum sekhee muaj cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv,

Nub kws cuaj Kinte‑auni tug tub Anpintaa kws ua xeem Npeeyamee tug thawj

Nub kws kaum Amisantai tug tub Ahiyexaw kws ua xeem Ntaaj tug thawj

ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Amisantai tug tub Ahiyexaw muab xyeem.
Nub kws kaum ib Aukhaa tug tub Paki‑ee kws ua xeem Asaw tug thawj

muab tej nuav xyeem, muab ib lub taig plab kws yog nyaj nyaav 130 sekhee, ib lub phaaj kws yog nyaj nyaav 70 sekhee nyaav lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ob lub puavleej muaj moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj puv nkaus huv ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,

ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Aukhaa tug tub Paki‑ee muab xyeem.
Nub kws kaum ob Ena tug tub Ahilaa kws ua xeem Nathali tug thawj

muab tej nuav xyeem, muab ib lub taig plab kws yog nyaj nyaav 130 sekhee, ib lub phaaj kws yog nyaj nyaav 70 sekhee nyaav lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, ob lub puavleej muaj moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj puv nkaus huv ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab muab ib lub taig kws yog kub nyaav kaum sekhee muaj cov moov tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv,
hab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj hab ib tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem,
ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem,
ob tug nyuj, tswb tug txwv yaaj, tswb tug txwv tshws hab tswb tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo. Tej nuav yog tej kws Ena tug tub Ahilaa muab xyeem.

Nuav yog tej hov txhua chaw kws cov ua thawj huv cov Yixayee muab xyeem ua kevcai pub lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub rua nub kws ua kevcai muab roj laub ywg lub thaaj, mas yog le nuav, 12 lub taig plab nyaj, 12 lub phaaj nyaj, 12 ob lub taig kub,
ib lub taig plab nyaj hov nyaav 130 sekhee, ib lub phaaj nyaj hov nyaav 70 sekhee, mas cov nyaj kws ua tej pestwj nuav huvsw nyaav 2,400 sekhee  lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub,
hab 12 lub taig kub kws muaj tshuaj tsw qaab puv nkaus huv, mas ib lub nyaav 10 sekhee lawv le tej sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub, mas cov kub kws ua tej taig nuav huvsw nyaav 120 sekhee.

Tej tsaj kws ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem muaj 12 tug txwv nyuj hab 12 tug txwv yaaj hab kaum ob tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj noob nyoog ib xyoos nrug cov kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos ua ke, hab muaj 12 tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem.

Tej tsaj kws tua ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo muaj 24 tug txwv nyuj, 60 tug txwv yaaj, 60 tug txwv tshws hab 60 tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws noob nyoog ib xyoos. Tej nuav yog tej kws muab xyeem ua kevcai pub lub thaaj rua Yawmsaub rua thaus kws ua kevcai laub roj taag lawd.

Thaus Mauxe nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab nrug Yawmsaub has lug, mas nwg nov Yawmsaub lub suab has huv plawv ob tug Khelunpee  sau lub hau roog kev txhum kws kaw lub swb xaab kws ntim Yawmsaub tej lug. Mas Yawmsaub lub suab nrug nwg has lug.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua Aloo tas, ‘Thaus yuav txawb xyaa lub teeb mas txawb kuas ci pum kev rua ntawm tug kaav teeb saab xubndag.’ ”
Mas Aloo kuj ua lawv le hov, nwg txawb cov teeb kuas ci pum kev rua ntawm tug kaav teeb saab xubndag lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe.

Tug kaav teeb ntawd ua zoo le nuav, yog muab kub ntaus ua lub taw thoob plhawv txug ncua cov paaj puavleej yog muab kub ntaus ua. Ua le nuav Mauxe txhad ntaus tug kaav teeb lawv le tug qauv kws Yawmsaub qha rua Mauxe.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le muab cov Levi rhu tawm huv cov Yixayee lug hab muab puab ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv.

Koj yuav tsum ua kevcai le nuav ntxuav puab kuas huv, muab cov dej kws ua kevcai ntxuav lug nchus rua puab. Kuas puab xuas chais chais plaub ib ce huvsw hab ntxhua tej tsoog tsho ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv.
Kuas puab muab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj hab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, hab koj yuav muab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj kws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem.
Hab koj yuav coj cov Levi tuaj rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab kuas ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee tuaj txoos ua ke.
Thaus kws coj cov Levi tuaj nyob rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag mas cov Yixayee yuav tsum muab teg npuab rua sau cov Levi,
hab Aloo yuav muab cov Levi xyeem rua Yawmsaub, yog yaam kws rhu huv cov Yixayee cev xyeem sub puab txhad ua tau Yawmsaub teg num.

Mas cov Levi yuav muab teg npuab sau ob tug txwv nyuj taubhau, tes koj muab ib tug lug ua kevcai xyeem daws txem, hab muab ib tug lug ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem rua Yawmsaub txhad ntxuav tau cov Levi kev txhum.
Koj yuav kuas cov Levi sawv ntsug ntawm Aloo hab Aloo cov tub xubndag hab koj yuav muab puab ua kevcai cev xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
“Ua le nuav koj yuav muab cov Levi cais ntawm cov Yixayee mas cov Levi yuav yog kuv tug.
Thaus koj tub ua kevcai ntxuav puab kuas huv hab ua kevcai muab puab cev xyeem rua Yawmsaub lawd, txwj hov moog cov Levi yuav nkaag moog ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb,
tsua qhov puab raug muab rhu tawm huv cov Yixayee lug pub hlo rua kuv. Kuv muab puab lug ua kuv tug theej txhua tug mivnyuas kws yug huv lub plaab lug, yog theej cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub,

tsua qhov cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub tsw has mivnyuas tuabneeg mivnyuas tsaj txhu los puavleej yog kuv le. Nub kws kuv tau tua tej tub hlub huv Iyi tebchaws huvsw kuv cais kuas puab dawb huv rua kuv lawm.
Kuv tub muab cov Levi lug theej cov Yixayee txhua tug tub hlub lawm.

Kuv tub muab cov Levi rhu tawm huv cov Yixayee lug pub hlo rua Aloo hab Aloo cov tub kuas nyob cov Yixayee chaw ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab ntxuav cov Yixayee kev txhum, sub txhad tsw muaj vej sub vej sw lug raug cov Yixayee rua thaus kws puab tuaj ze lub chaw pe Yawmsaub.”
Mauxe hab Aloo hab ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee suavdawg tau ua rua cov Levi le nuav. Lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua rua cov Levi mas cov Yixayee kuj ua lawv nraim.
Cov Levi kuj ua kevcai ntxuav kuas huv hab ntxhua puab tej tsoog tsho mas Aloo ua kevcai muab puab cev xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, hab Aloo ua kevcai ntxuav puab kev txhum puab txhad le huv.
Txwj thaus hov lug cov Levi txhad le moog ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, yog paab Aloo hab Aloo cov tub. Lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua rua cov Levi tes puab txhad ua tau le hov.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Nuav ntswg txug cov Levi, cov Levi kws noob nyoog neeg nkaum tswb xyoos rov sau yuav nkaag moog ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Thaus puab noob nyoog muaj tswb caug xyoo puab yuav tsum su tsw xob ua num lawm.
Tassws puab paab tau puab cov kwvtij ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb, kuas tsw xob ua num le qub. Koj yuav ua le nuav rua thaus koj feeb num rua cov Levi ua.”
Xyoo kws ob lub ib hlis suav txwj thaus puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai tas,
“Kuas cov Yixayee ua txuj kevcai Hlaa Dhau lawv le lub swjhawm kws teem ca.
Lub hli nuav nub xab kaum plaub thaus yuav tsaus ntuj, mej yuav tsum ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau lawv le lub swjhawm teem ca. Mej yuav tsum ua lawv le tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai huvsw.”
Mauxe txhad has kuas cov Yixayee ua txuj kevcai Hlaa Dhau.

Puab txhad ua txuj kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua lub ib hlis nub xab kaum plaub thaus tsaus ntuj ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai. Tej kws Yawmsaub tau has rua Mauxe, mas cov Yixayee kuj ua txhua yaam huvsw.
Muaj qee tug txwvneej kws qas tsw huv vem yog kov tug tuag txhad ua tsw tau kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua nub hov, puab txhad tuaj cuag Mauxe hab Aloo rua nub ntawd.
Puab has rua Mauxe tas, “Peb qas tsw huv vem yog peb kov tug tuag. Ua caag yuav txwv tsw kheev peb koom nrug cov Yixayee coj Yawmsaub tej hov txhua chaw tuaj xyeem rua lub swjhawm kws teem tseg?”
Mas Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Nyob tuabywv tog, moog txug thaus kuv nov saib Yawmsaub has le caag txug mej.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Yog mej cov leejtwg lossws mej cov caaj ceg leejtwg qas tsw huv vem yog kov tug tuag, lossws moog kev deb, tug hov kuj tseed yuav tsum ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua Yawmsaub.
Ca puab ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua lub ob hlis nub xab kaum plaub thaus tsaus ntuj. Puab noj ncuav tsw xyaw keeb hab noj txum lom ab.
Puab tsw xob tseg ib qho seem rua kaaj ntug, hab tsw xob muab tug mivnyuas yaaj hov ib tug pob txhaa luv le. Puab yuav tsum coj lawv le tej kaab ke ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau txhua nqai huvsw.

Tassws tug kws huv hab tsw tau moog kev deb kuas ho tseg tsw ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau mas muab nwg txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg vem yog nwg tsw coj Yawmsaub tej hov txhua chaw tuaj xyeem lawv le lub swjhawm kws teem tseg, mas nwg yuav rws nwg lub txem.

Yog lwm haiv tuabneeg lug nrug mej nyob leejtwg hab xaav ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau rua Yawmsaub nwg yuav tsum coj lawv le tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai kws ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau. Mej yuav tsum muaj tuab txuj kevcai rua lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob hab rua haiv Yixayee coj.’ ”

Nub kws tsaa lub tsev ntaub, tauv fuab lug laum nkaus lub tsev ntaub, yog lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug nyob rua huv. Thaus tsaus ntuj tauv fuab kws nyob sau lub tsev ntaub hov zoo yaam nkaus le nplaim suavtawg moog txug kaaj ntug.
Muaj le nuav tsw tu ncua le. Nruab nub tauv fuab laum nkaus, mo ntuj mas zoo le nplaim suavtawg.
Thaus twg tauv fuab sawv sau lub tsev ntaub lawm, tes cov Yixayee kuj tshais chaw moog thaus ntawd. Tauv fuab moog nqeg lug rua qhov twg cov Yixayee kuj tsuam chaw nyob rua hov ntawd.
Cov Yixayee kuj tshais chaw moog lawv le Yawmsaub has, hab tsuam chaw nyob lawv le Yawmsaub has. Tauv fuab nyob sau lub tsev ntaub ntev le caag, puab kuj nyob huv lub chaw ntev le hov.
Txawm yog tauv fuab nyob sau lub tsev ntaub ntau nub los cov Yixayee kuj ua lawv le kws Yawmsaub has tsw tshais chaw moog le.
Qee zag tauv fuab nyob sau lub tsev ntaub tsw muaj pes tsawg nub, puab kuj nyob huv lub chaw lawv le Yawmsaub has, hab tshais chaw moog lawv le Yawmsaub has.

Qee zag tauv fuab nyob thaus tsaus ntuj txug kaaj ntug xwb. Thaus kaaj ntug tauv fuab sawv moog lawm puab kuj tshais chaw moog. Yog tauv fuab nyob ib nub ib mos mas thaus tauv fuab sawv moog lawm puab kuj tshais chaw moog.

Txawm yog tauv fuab nyob sau lub tsev ntaub ob nub lossws ib hlis lossws ntev dua, los cov Yixayee nyob huv lub chaw ntev le hov tsw tshais chaw moog. Thaus tauv fuab sawv moog puab kuj tshais chaw moog thaus hov.
Puab tsuam chaw nyob lawv le Yawmsaub has, hab puab tshais chaw moog lawv le Yawmsaub has. Puab ua lawv le Yawmsaub tej lug nkaw, yog lawv le tej lug kws Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Muab nyaj ntaus ua ob lub raaj xyu mas swv hu cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke hab swv rua thaus tshais chaw tswv moog.
Thaus tshuab ob lub raaj hov ua ke mas ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg yuav tsum tuaj txoos ua ke cuag koj rua ntawm txujkev kws nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Tassws yog tshuab tuab lub raaj xwb tes cov kws ua hlub kws yog txhua xeem Yixayee tug thawj yuav tsum tuaj cuag koj xwb.
Thaus kws tshuab raaj txhwb mas cov zog kws nyob saab nub tuaj yuav tsum sawv kev moog.
Thaus tshuab raaj txhwb zag ob tes cov zog kws nyob saab nraag yuav sawv kev moog. Thaus twg yuav kuas sawv kev moog mas yuav tshuab raaj txhwb.
Thaus twg yuav hu ib tsoom pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke, kuj tshuab raaj hu, kuas tsw xob txhwb.
Aloo cov tub kws ua pov thawj yuav tshuab tej raaj nuav. Ob lub raaj nuav yog ib txuj kevcai rua mej coj ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhab ib txhws moog le.

Hab thaus mej ua rog rua huv mej lub tebchaws kws muaj yeeb ncuab tuaj quab yuam mej, kuj ca le tshuab raaj txhwb sub Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv txhad le ncu txug mej hab cawm mej dim mej cov yeeb ncuab.

Nub kws mej muaj kev zoo sab xyiv faab hab nub kws teem ua kevcai noj haus hab nub kws hli xab ib, mas mej yuav tshuab raaj rua thaus ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab thaus tua tsaj ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo txhad ua rua mej tug Vaajtswv ncu txug mej. Kuv yog Yawmsaub yog mej tug Vaajtswv.”
Nub tim neeg nkaum lub ob hlis xyoo kws ob, tauv fuab txawm sawv ntawm Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Yawmsaub tej lug.
Cov Yixayee kuj sawv kev moog ua ib ntus ib ntus tawm ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai moog. Tauv fuab hov lug nreg rua ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa.
Puab txhad sawv kev moog lawv le Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua puab yog tswv thawj zag.
Xeem Yuta lub zog tug chij sawv kev moog ua ib paab ib paab ua ntej, Aminanta tug tub Nasoo ua puab tug thawj.
Xu‑a tug tub Nethanee ua thawj coj xeem Ixakha,
Heloo tug tub Elia ua thawj coj xeem Xenpuloo.
Thaus lauj Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub lawd mas Kwsoo ceg hab Melali ceg kws muaj feem kwv Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub sawv kev moog.
Xeem Lunpee lub zog tug chij sawv kev moog ua ib paab ib paab, Sente‑aw tug tub Elixu ua puab tug thawj.
Xulisantai tug tub Selumi‑ee ua thawj coj xeem Xime‑oo,
Nte‑u‑ee tug tub Eliyaxa ua thawj coj xeem Kas.
Khauha ceg txhad le sawv kev kwv txhua yaam kws dawb huv moog. Thaus cov nuav tsw tau moog txug, cov ua ntej tub tsaa tau Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub lawm.
Xeem Efa‑i lub zog tug chij sawv kev moog ua ib paab ib paab, Amihu tug tub Elisama ua puab tug thawj,
Pentaxu tug tub Kamali‑ee ua thawj coj xeem Manaxe,
Kinte‑auni tug tub Anpintaa ua thawj coj xeem Npeeyamee.
Xeem Ntaaj lub zog tug chij txhad le sawv kev moog ua ib paab ib paab, ua paab kawg tom qaab faaj seeb txhua paab kws moog ua ntej lawd. Amisantai tug tub Ahiyexaw ua puab tug thawj.
Aukhaa tug tub Paki‑ee ua thawj coj xeem Asaw,
Ena tug tub Ahila ua thawj coj xeem Nathali.
Thaus cov Yixayee sawv kev tswv moog mas puab moog quas zug ua ib paab ib paab lawv le kws has nuav.

Mauxe has rua nwg yawm daab Haunpas kws yog Le‑u‑ee tug tub yog tuabneeg Mintee has tas, “Peb sawv kev moog kuas txug lub chaw kws Yawmsaub has tas, nwg yuav pub rua peb. Koj ca le nrug peb moog. Peb yuav ua zoo rua koj tsua qhov Yawmsaub cog lug has tas nwg yuav pub yaam kws zoo rua cov Yixayee.”
Tassws nwg teb Mauxe tas, “Kuv tsw moog, kuv yuav rov moog rua kuv teb kuv chaw rua kuv kwv kuv tij.”
Mauxe has tas, “Thov koj tsw xob ncaim peb moog le. Koj yeej paub lawm tas peb yuav tsuam chaw nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua rua hovtwg mas koj yuav tau ua peb qhov ntsej qhov muag.
Yog koj nrug peb moog Yawmsaub ua zoo le caag rua peb mas peb yuav ua zoo le ntawd rua koj.”
Puab txhad sawv kev ntawm Yawmsaub lub roob moog tau peb nub ke. Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug moog ua puab ntej tau peb nub, moog nrhav chaw rua puab tsuam.
Thaus puab tshais chaw sawv kev moog Yawmsaub tauv fuab nyob quas rawv sau puab taag nub le.
Lub swb xaab sawv kev moog thaus twg mas Mauxe has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, thov koj sawv tseeg ua kuas koj tej yeeb ncuab tawg tswv ua saab ua sua moog, ua kuas koj tej tshawj chim tswv ntawm koj moog.”
Thaus lub swb xaab nyob tug chaw, Mauxe has tas, “Au Yawmsaub, thov koj rov lug nrug cov Yixayee kws coob suav tsw txheeb nyob.”

Cov pejxeem ywg puab tej kev txom nyem rua Yawmsaub nov. Thaus Yawmsaub nov lawm nwg txujkev npau tawg kuj tshwm plawg rua puab, Yawmsaub le suavtawg lug kub huv plawv puab hab hlawv puab lub ntug zog kub nyab ib txha lawm.
Mas cov pejxeem quaj thov Mauxe, Mauxe txhad thov Yawmsaub mas suavtawg txhad tuag.
Puab txhad muab lub chaw hov hu ua Thanpela,  vem yog Yawmsaub le suavtawg lug kub huv plawv puab.
Lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab lug nqhes nqaj heev hab cov Yixayee los quaj quaj ywg tas, “Xaav tau nqaj noj kawg le.
Peb ncu txug tej ntseg kws peb txeev noj tim Iyi tebchaws tsw txug yuav le, hab ncu txug tej dib tej toob tej dog raaj dog ntug hab qej.
Nwgnuav peb qaug zug taag lawm hab tsw muaj daabtsw rua peb saib tsuas yog cov mana nuav xwb.”
Cov mana zoo yaam le noob zaub txhwb qab hab saib zoo le roj ntoos tsw qaab.
Cov pejxeem moog khaws lug zum lossws muab tuav huv taig hab muab rua huv laujkaub hau ua ncuav, qaab yaam le ncuav kib roj.
Thaus tsaus ntuj lug lwg rua huv lub zog cov mana kuj poob lug hab.
Mauxe nov cov pejxeem quaj thoob plawg txhua yim, nyag nyob ntawm nyag lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub. Yawmsaub npau tawg quas vog, Mauxe kuj nyuaj sab heev.
Mauxe txhad has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Ua caag koj ua rua koj tug tub qhe raug ceblaaj le nuav? Ua caag koj tsw txaus sab rua kuv es muab cov tuabneeg nuav huvsw rua kuv ib leeg rws?

Kuv xeeb cov tuabneeg nuav rua huv kuv lub plaab lov? Kuv yug puab lug lov? Koj txhad has rua kuv tas, ‘Muab puab puag rua huv koj xubndag ib yaam le tug nkauj qhev puag tug mivnyuas mog lab, coj lug rua huv lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub cog lug ruaj tas yuav pub rua puab tej laug.’
Kuv yuav muab nqaj hovtwg lug pub rua cov tuabneeg nuav suavdawg noj? Puab quaj rua kuv tas, ‘Thov muab nqaj rua peb noj.’
Kuv ib leeg tsw muaj peevxwm rws tau cov tuabneeg nuav suavdawg, yog lub nraa kws nyaav dhau kuv.
Yog koj yuav ua le nuav rua kuv, yog kuv txaus koj lub sab lawm thov koj ca le muab kuv tua taamswm nuav sub kuv txhad tsw pum kuv txujkev txom nyem nyuaj sab.”

Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le sau zog Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug xyaa caum leej kws koj paub tas yog cov pejxeem le thawj hab cov kws kaav puab, mas coj puab tuaj rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab ca puab nrug koj sawv ua ke rua hov ntawd.
Kuv yuav nqeg lug nrug koj sws thaam hov ntawd hab kuv yuav faib ntsuj plig kws nyob sau koj moog tso rua sau puab, mas puab yuav nrug koj rws cov tuabneeg nuav sub koj txhad tsw tau rws ib leeg xwb.

Hab has rua cov pejxeem tas, ‘Mej ca le tu mej kuas dawb huv rua pigkig, mej yuav tau nqaj noj, tsua qhov mej tau quaj rua Yawmsaub nov has tas, “Xaav tau nqaj noj kawg le. Peb txeev noj qaab nyob zoo heev dua le nuav huv Iyi tebchaws.” Vem le nuav Yawmsaub yuav pub nqaj rua mej mas mej yuav tau noj.
Mej yuav tsw noj ib nub los ob nub los tswb nub los kaum nub los neeg nkaum nub xwb,

tassws mej yuav tau noj ib hlis txwm nkaus moog txug nqaj tawm huv mej qhov ntswg lug hab mej dhuav hlo cov nqaj hov, tsua qhov mej tau tso Yawmsaub tseg hab quaj rua nwg tas, Ua caag peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug lawm?’ ”
Mas Mauxe has tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws kuv nrug nyob nuav muaj 600,000 leej txwvneej es koj has tas koj yuav muab nqaj rua puab noj kuas txwm ib lub hlis.
Yuav muab tej paab yaaj paab tshws paaj nyuj tua txaus puab noj lov? Lossws yuav sau zog tej ntseg taag nrho huv havtxwv lug txaus rua puab noj lov?”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Yawmsaub txhais teg tuab lu dhau lawm lov? Nwgnuav koj yuav pum tas kuv tej lug yuav tav rua koj los tsw tav.”
Mauxe txhad tawm moog has Yawmsaub tej lug rua cov pejxeem, hab nwg sau tau xyaa caum leej kev txwj quas laug huv cov pejxeem tsaa puab lug sawv vej lub tsev ntaub.

Mas Yawmsaub nqeg huv tauv fuab lug has rua Mauxe hab faib ntsuj plig kws nyob sau Mauxe moog tso rua sau xyaa caum leej kev txwj quas laug hov. Thaus ntsuj plig nyob sau puab lawm puab txawm cev Vaajtswv lug, tassws puab tsw rov cev dua le lawm.

Tseed tshuav ob tug nyob huv lub zog, ib tug yog Eenta hab ib tug yog Menta, ntsuj plig kuj lug rua sau ob tug. Ob tug tub sau npe ca lawm kuas tsw tau tuaj rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub, ob tug ca le cev Vaajtswv lug rua huv lub zog.
Muaj ib tug hluas dha tuaj has rua Mauxe tas, “Eenta hab Menta saamswm cev Vaajtswv lug rua huv lub zog.”
Mas Yausua kws yog Noo tug tub kws ua tug paab Mauxe txwj thaus hluas lug has rua Mauxe tas, “Kuv tug tswv Mauxe, ca le txwv ob tug los maj.”
Tassws Mauxe has rua nwg tas, “Koj mob sab vem yog saib rua kuv lov? Kuv xaav kuas Yawmsaub haiv tuabneeg txhua tug cev Vaajtswv lug hab xaav kuas Yawmsaub tso ntsuj plig rua sau puab.”
Mauxe hab Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug txawm rov moog rua huv lub zog.
Tes Yawmsaub txawm tso cua ntsawj huv havtxwv xaa noog ws tuaj poob rua ib ncig puab lub zog txhua faab ib faab moog deb ib nub ke hab poob sab rua sau npoo aav tuab le ob tshwm.
Nub ntawd cov pejxeem moog khaws noog ws ib nub ib mos hab nub tom qaab ib nub. Tug kws khaws tau tsawg kawg mas khaws tau kaum haumaw.  Puab coj lug zab thoob plawg huv lub zog.
Thaus tej nqaj hov tseed nyob huv puab qhov ncauj hab noj tsw tau taag, Yawmsaub txujkev chim tshwm plawg rua cov pejxeem, Yawmsaub txhad tso mob phem luj tua puab.
Puab txhad hu lub chaw hov ua Khilau Hata‑ava  tsua qhov puab log cov tuabneeg kws nqhes nqaj tuag rua hov ntawd.
Cov pejxeem tshais chaw ntawm Khilau Hata‑ava moog txug Haxelau, hab tsuam chaw nyob ntawm Haxelau.
Mili‑aa hab Aloo thuaj Mauxe vem yog tug puj Khuj kws Mauxe tau yuav, vem yog Mauxe tau yuav ib tug tuabneeg Khuj ua quaspuj.
Ob tug txhad has tas, “Yawmsaub has lug tuaj rua Mauxe tuab leeg xwb lov? Yawmsaub tsw has lug tuaj rua ib hab lov?” Yawmsaub kuj nov tej kws ob tug has.
Mauxe yog ib tug kws tsw muab hlub hlo le, nwg txu fwjchim qeg dhau tej tuabneeg huv qaab ntuj huvsw.
Taamswm hov Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo hab Mili‑aa tas, “Mej peb leeg ca le tawm tuaj rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.” Puab peb leeg txhad tawm tuaj.
Yawmsaub kuj nrug ncej fuab lug sawv ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub mas hu Aloo hab Mili‑aa. Ob tug txhad txaav lug.
Yawmsaub has tas, “Ca le noog kuv tej lug. Yog muaj ib tug cev kuv le lug huv plawv mej, kuj yog kuv kws yog Yawmsaub qha rua tug hov ua yug quas toog pum hab has rua nwg huv npau suav.
Tassws kuv tug tub qhe Mauxe mas tsw thooj le hov. Nwg yog tug kws kuv muab kuv haiv tuabneeg suavdawg cob rua nwg saib.
Kuv nrug nwg has twb ncauj nreeg meej meej tsw yog ua paaj lug ua pev lug has, hab nwg pum Yawmsaub tug yaam ntxwv. Ua le caag meb tub tsw ntshai le es yuav thuaj kuv tug tub qhe Mauxe?”
Yawmsaub npau tawg heev rua ob tug, nwg ca le moog lawm.

Mas thaus tauv fuab ntaab plawg dhau lub tsev ntaub moog lawd, na cav Mili‑aa ca le mob ruas dawb paug yaam nkaus le daus xwb daus npu. Aloo tig moog saib Mili‑aa mas pum tas Mili‑aa mob lis mob ruas lawm.
Aloo txhad has rua Mauxe tas, “Yawm hlub, thov tsw xob rau txem rua ib kws tau ua kev ruag kev txhum txem nuav.
Thov tsw xob ca Mili‑aa zoo yaam le tug mivnyuas kws yug tau lug yeej tuag lawd, nqaj ntsws taag ib nraab.”
Mas Mauxe txhad quaj thov Yawmsaub, “Au Vaajtswv, thov koj khu nwg.”
Tassws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Yog nwg txwv ntu qub ncaug rua nwg lub ntsej muag, mas nwg yuav txaaj muag xyaa nub xwb. Muab nwg kaw rua saab nrau lub zog xyaa nub le maav pub nwg rov lug tau.”
Yog le nuav Mili‑aa txhad raug kaw rua saab nrau lub zog xyaa nub. Cov pejxeem kuj tsw sawv kev tswv tawm moog txug thaus Mili‑aa rov qaab lug.
Dhau hov cov pejxeem sawv kev ntawm Haxelau moog tsuam chaw nyob tom tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le xaa tuabneeg moog tshuaj saib Khana‑aa tebchaws kws kuv pub rua cov Yixayee. Ca le xaa txhua xeem ib xeem ib leeg, txhua tug yog ua thawj huv nwg xeem.”
Mauxe txhad khaiv puab tawm huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa moog lawv le Yawmsaub has, txhua tug yog ua thawj huv cov Yixayee.
Ntawm nuav moog yog puab cov ntawd le npe. Xeem Lunpee yog Samu‑a kws yog Xakaw tug tub,
xeem Xime‑oo yog Hauli tug tub Safa,
xeem Yuta yog Yefune tug tub Khalej,
xeem Ixakha yog Ikaa kws yog Yauxej tug tub,
xeem Efa‑i yog Noo tug tub Hause‑a,
xeem Npeeyamee yog Lafu tug tub Pati,
xeem Xenpuloo yog Xaunti tug tub Kanti‑ee,
xeem Yauxej kws yog xeem Manaxe yog Xuxi tug tub Kanti,
xeem Ntaaj yog Kemali tug tub Ami‑ee,
xeem Asaw yog Mikha‑ee tug tub Xethu,
xeem Nathali yog Vauxi tug tub Nanpi,
xeem Kas yog Makhis tug tub Ke‑u‑ee.
Cov npe nuav yog cov tuabneeg kws Mauxe khaiv moog tshuaj tebchaws. Mauxe tis npe rua Hause‑a kws yog Noo tug tub hu ua Yausua.
Mauxe khaiv puab moog tshuaj Khana‑aa tebchaws hab has rua puab tas, “Ca le moog peg Neke hab nce moog rua peg toj sab,
moog tshuaj saib lub tebchaws hov zoo le caag hab saib cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov muaj zug los tsw muaj, muaj tuabneeg coob los tsawg,
hab saib lub tebchaws kws puab nyob hov zoo los phem, hab saib puab tej chaw nyob yog ua zej zog los yog ua moos muaj ntsaa loog ruaj khov,

hab saib lub tebchaws zoo qoob loos los tsw zoo hab muaj xyoob ntoo los tsw muaj. Mej ca le ua sab tuab hab coj tej txwv ntoo huv lub tebchaws hov ib txha lug.” Lub swjhawm hov yog lub caij kws thawj phaum txwv maab sav.
Puab txhad nce moog tshuaj tebchaws txwj ndua ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xee moog txug lub moos Lehau kws nyob ze txujkev kws moog rua lub moos Hama.

Puab nce moog txug Neke hab moog txug lub moos Heploo. Ahimaa hab Sesai hab Thaamai kws yog Anaj cov caaj ceg nyob hov ntawd. Lub moos Heploo nuav luas rhawv ua ntej lub moos Xau‑aa huv Iyi tebchaws xyaa xyoo.
Puab txawm moog txug lub haav Ekhau mas puab txav ib ceg txwv maab kws muaj ib tauv txwv hov ntawd, muab laag ntxwg rua ob leeg kwv lug. Puab coj txwv ntsab pobkws hab txwv cua ib txha lug.
Lub chaw hov raug muab hu ua lub haav Ekhau  vem cov Yixayee txav tauv txwv maab hov ntawd lug.
Puab moog tshuaj lub tebchaws tau plaub caug nub le rov qaab lug.

Puab lug txug ntawm Mauxe hab Aloo hab ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Palaa ntawm lub moos Khante. Puab pav rua ob tug hab cov pejxeem suavdawg noog hab muab tej txwv ntoo huv lub tebchaws hov rua puab saib.
Puab has rua Mauxe tas, “Peb moog txug lub tebchaws kws koj khaiv peb moog, muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo hab nuav yog tej txwv ntoo huv lub tebchaws hov.
Tassws cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov muaj zug heev hab puab tej moos kuj luj hab muaj ntsaa loog ruaj khov. Dua le ntawd peb kuj pum Anaj tej caaj ceg nyob hov ntawd.
Cov Amalej nyob rua huv Neke tebchaws, cov Hithai, cov Yenpu hab cov Amaulai nyob peg toj sab. Cov Khana‑aa nyob npuas ntug havtxwv hab lawv ntug dej Yalatee.”
Tassws Khalej kuas cov pejxeem nyob tuabywv rua ntawm Mauxe xubndag hab has tas, “Peb ca le nce moog txeeb tebchaws taamswm nuav, tsua qhov peb yeej muaj peevxwm kov yeej tau.”
Tassws cov txwvneej kws nrug Khalej moog hov has tas, “Peb tsw muaj peevxwm ntaus yeej cov tuabneeg hov tsua qhov puab muaj zug heev dua peb.”

Tes puab txawm has tsw zoo txug lub tebchaws kws puab moog tshuaj hov rua cov Yixayee noog has tas, “Lub tebchaws kws peb moog tshuaj thoob plawg hov yog nam tebchaws noj cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv. Cov tuabneeg kws peb pum hov suavdawg puavleej sab heev.
Peb pum cov Nefili kuj nyob hov ntawd, cov tuabneeg Anaj yog tshwm ntawm cov Nefili lug. Peb saib mas peb zoo yaam nkaus le tej nyuas kooj xwb, puab kuj pum peb zoo le ntawd hab.”
Tes ib tsoom pejxeem txawm tsaa suab qw nrov nrov, hab mo ntawd cov pejxeem quaj ib mos.
Cov Yixayee suavdawg ywg ywg Mauxe hab Aloo. Ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg has rua ob tug tas, “Peb tuag rua huv Iyi tebchaws lossws tuag huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav kuj zoo dua.
Ua caag Yawmsaub coj peb lug tuag nav ntaaj nav rag rua huv lub tebchaws nuav? Peb tej quaspuj mivnyuas yuav poob ua luas le. Peb rov moog rua Iyi tebchaws zoo dua lauj.”
Puab ib leeg has rua ib leeg tas, “Ca peb xaiv ib tug ua thawj es rov qaab moog rua Iyi tebchaws lauj.”
Mauxe hab Aloo ca le khwb nkaus ua lub plhu ti nkaus huv aav taab meeg cov Yixayee suavdawg kws tuaj txoos ua ke.
Mas Yausua kws yog Noo tug tub hab Khalej kws yog Yefune tug tub kws nrug puab moog tshuaj lub tebchaws hov txawm dua rhe ob tug lub tsho,
hab has rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tas, “Lub tebchaws kws peb moog tshuaj saib thoob plawg hov yog lub tebchaws kws zoo heev.
Yog Yawmsaub txaus sab rua peb, nwg yuav coj peb moog rua huv lub tebchaws hov hab muab pub rua peb, yog lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo.

Tsuav yog mej tsw xob faav xeeb rua Yawmsaub xwb, tsw xob ntshai cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov, tsua qhov puab yog peb tej kua zaub. Tug fwjchim kws tsom kwm puab tub raug muab rhu lawm, Yawmsaub nrug nraim peb mas tsw xob ntshai puab le.”

Tassws ib tsoom pejxeem suavdawg has zum zawg kuas xuas pob zeb ntaus ob tug. Taamswm ntawd Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab lug tshwm rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb taab meeg cov Yixayee suavdawg.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Cov tuabneeg nuav yuav saib tsw taug kuv ntev le caag? Txawm yog kuv tub ua txujci phemfwj ntau heev tshwm rua huv plawv puab lawm los puab tseed yuav tsw ntseeg kuv moog ntev le caag?
Kuv yuav tso mob kis lug tua puab hab tsw pub puab tau kuv le qub txeeg qub teg, tassws kuv yuav tsaa koj ua ib haiv tuabneeg luj hab muaj zug heev dua puab.”
Tassws Mauxe has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Cov Iyi yuav nov zaaj nuav tsua qhov koj tug fwjchim tub coj haiv tuabneeg nuav tawm huv plawv puab lug,

mas cov Iyi yuav pav zaaj nuav rua cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav paub. Au Yawmsaub, puab yeej nov tas koj nrug nraim haiv tuabneeg nuav. Au Yawmsaub, puab nov tas muaj tuabneeg pum koj tim ntsej tim muag, hab koj tauv fuab nyob sau cov Yixayee hab nruab nub koj nyob huv ncej fuab mo ntuj koj nyob huv ncej suavtawg moog ua puab ntej.
Nwgnuav yog koj ua tuab zag tua haiv tuabneeg nuav tuag taag nrho, tej tebchaws kws tau nov koj lub moo yuav has tas,
‘Tub yog Yawmsaub coj tsw tau haiv tuabneeg nuav moog txug lub tebchaws kws nwg cog lug ruaj tas nwg yuav muab rua puab, nwg txhad muab puab tua pov tseg taag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua.’
Nwgnuav kuv thov koj, ca Yawmsaub tug fwjchim luj tshwm lug yaam le kws koj tau cog lug ca tas,

‘Yawmsaub tsw chim sai, nwg txujkev hlub kws ruaj khov muaj nplua quas mag, nwg zaam txem rua tej kev ua phem ua qas hab kev faav xeeb, tassws nwg kuj tsw suav tas tsw txhum, nwg yuav rau leej txwv lub txem poob moog rua cov tub ki peb plaub tam.’
Kuv thov koj zaam txem rua haiv tuabneeg nuav lawv le koj txujkev hlub ruaj khov kws luj kawg hab ib yaam le koj tub zaam txem rua haiv tuabneeg nuav huv Iyi tebchaws lug txug naj nub nwgnuav.”
Mas Yawmsaub teb tas, “Kuv tub zaam txem lawv le koj tej lug thov lawm.
Kuv has tseeb, kuv yeej muaj txujsa nyob hab Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab yeej yuav puv nkaus lub nplajteb,
mas cov tuabneeg kws tub pum kuv tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab hab tej txujci phemfwj kws kuv tau ua huv Iyi tebchaws hab huv tebchaws moj saab qhua los tseed swm kuv kaum zag le nuav hab tsw noog kuv lug,
mas yuav tsw muaj ib tug pum lub tebchaws kws kuv cog lug ruaj tas yuav muab pub rua puab tej laug, hab cov kws saib tsw taug kuv yuav tsw muaj ib tug pum lub tebchaws hov hlo le.

Tassws kuv tug tub qhe Khalej, mas vem nwg lub sab tsw thooj le lwm tug hab nwg npuab kuv kawg sab kawg ntsws, kuv yuav coj nwg moog txug lub tebchaws kws nwg tub moog lug lawm, hab nwg caaj ceg yuav tau lub tebchaws hov ua puab tug.
Vem cov Amalej hab cov Khana‑aa nyob huv tej haav huv lub tebchaws hov, mas pigkig mej ca le tig hlo rov moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua taug kev moog txug Havtxwv Lab.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Haiv tuabneeg phem nuav yuav ywg kuv moog ntev le caag? Kuv tub nov tej lug kws cov Yixayee ywg, yog puab ywg kuv ntaag.
Koj ca le has rua puab tas, ‘Yawmsaub has tas, Kuv yeej muaj txujsa nyob, tej kws kuv nov mej has, kuv yuav ua rua mej.
Mej tej cev tuag yuav poob taag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav. Mej cov tuabneeg suavdawg kws muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rua sau kws tau ywg kuv,
tsw muaj ib tug yuav moog txug lub tebchaws kws kuv cog lug ruaj tas yuav pub rua mej nyob, tsuas yog Khalej kws yog Yefune tug tub hab Yausua kws yog Noo tug tub txhad moog txug xwb.
Mej cov mivnyuas yau kws mej has tas yuav poob ua luas le, kuv yuav coj puab lug txug huv lub tebchaws hab puab yuav paub lub tebchaws kws mej saib tsw taug hov.
Tassws mej mas mej tej cev tuag yuav poob rua huv tebchaws mooj saab qhua nuav.

Mej cov mivnyuas yuav yug tsaj huv tebchaws moj saab qhua plaub caug xyoo hab puab yuav raug txom nyem vem yog tim qhov kws mej tso kuv tseg, moog txug thaus mej tej cev tuag nyob txwm rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav.
Npaum le lub swjhawm kws mej moog tshuaj lub tebchaws tau plaub caug nub hov, mej yuav rws mej lub txem plaub caug xyoo, ib nub ua ib xyoos, hab mej yuav paub tas kuv tsw txaus sab rua mej.’

Kuv yog Yawmsaub tau has ca le nuav. Kuv yeej yuav ua lawv le nuav rua haiv tuabneeg phem suavdawg kws tuaj txoos ua ke koom sab tawm tsaam kuv nuav. Puab yuav pluj taag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav, puab yuav tuag taag rua hov ntawd.”
Cov tuabneeg kws Mauxe khaiv moog tshuaj tebchaws, yog cov kws rov lug has phem txug lub tebchaws hov ua rua ib tsoom pejxeem ywg Mauxe,
mas cov tuabneeg kws has phem txug lub tebchaws hov raug mob phem tuag taag rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.
Tassws Yausua kws yog Noo tug tub hab Khalej kws yog Yefune tug tub kws nrug puab ua ib paab moog tshuaj tebchaws hov, tsw tuag.
Mauxe has tej lug nuav rua cov Yixayee suavdawg noog, mas cov pejxeem nyuaj sab hab quaj heev kawg le.
Mas puab sawv ntxuv tseeg nce moog rua peg toj sab has tas, “Saib maj, peb nyob nuav lawm, peb yuav nce moog rua lub chaw kws Yawmsaub cog lug ca, tsua qhov peb tau ua txhum lawm.”
Tassws Mauxe has tas, “Ua caag mej tsw ua lawv le Yawmsaub has? Qhov kws mej ua yuav tsw tav.
Tsw xob nce moog tsaam tes mej yuav tuag taag rua ntawm yeeb ncuab xubndag, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tsw nrug nraim mej.
Cov Amalej hab cov Khana‑aa nyob ntawm mej hauv ntej, mej yuav tuag taag rua puab nav ntaaj nav rag. Vem mej tso Yawmsaub tseg, Yawmsaub yuav tsw nrug nraim mej lawm.”
Txawm yog Yawmsaub lub swb xaab sws cog lug hab Mauxe tsw tawm huv lub zog moog los puab tseed yuam qhe nce moog peg toj sab.
Cov Amalej hab cov Khana‑aa kws nyob peg toj sab nqeg lug ntaus yeej puab hab muab puab lawv moog txug lub moos Hauma.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Koj ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej txeem rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej yuav nyob hov kws kuv pub rua mej,

mas yog mej leejtwg yuav muab nyuj muab yaaj muab tshws hlawv kub nyab xyeem ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem lossws ua kevcai tua xyeem pauj tej kws nwg fev ca lawd lossws nwg zoo sab pub xwb, lossws yog tej swjhawm kws teem rua mej ua kevcai noj haus, yog ua kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab,
mas tug kws coj tuaj xyeem hov yuav tsum muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa moov mog zoo zoo ntse ib feem plaub huv ib hee  roj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos.
Koj yuav npaaj ib feem plaub huv ib hee cawv txwv maab ua kevcai laub xyeem rua txhua tug mivnyuas yaaj kws ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab ua kevcai tua xyeem.
Tassws yog ib tug txwv yaaj, mas koj yuav npaaj ob feem kaum huv ib efa  moov mog zoo zoo ntse ib feem peb huv ib hee  roj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab koj yuav muab ib feem peb huv ib hee  cawv txwv maab ua kevcai laub xyeem ua kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
Thaus koj npaaj txwv nyuj ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem lossws ua kevcai tua xyeem kws yog pauj tej kws fev ca lawd lossws ua kevcai sws raug zoo rua Yawmsaub,
tes muab peb feem kaum huv ib efa moov mog zoo zoo ntse ib nraab hee  roj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos,
hab koj yuav muab ib nraab hee cawv txwv maab ua kevcai laub xyeem ua tej kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
“ ‘Mej yuav tsum ua le nuav rua txhua tug txwv nyuj txwv yaaj rua mivnyuas txwv yaaj hab mivnyuas txwv tshws huvsw.
Yuav ua le nuav rua txhua tug tsaj npaum le kws npaaj tuaj.
Cov Yixayee kws nyob txum tim txhua tug yuav tsum ua le kws has taag nuav rua thaus muab tsaj hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.

Yog lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob lossws leejtwg kws nrug mej nyob ib txhab ib txhws xaav muab tsaj hlawv kub nyab kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, mas kuas nwg ua lawv nraim le kws mej ua nuav.

Yuav tsum muaj tuab txuj kevcai nuav rua mej cov tuabneeg hab rua lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob, yog ib txuj kevcai kws yuav tsum coj ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhab ib txhws moog le. Mej zoo le caag mas tug kws nrug mej nyob yuav zoo le hov rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.
Yuav muaj tuab txuj kevcai hab tuab txuj kaab ke nuav rua mej hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej txeem moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv yuav coj mej moog hov,
hab thaus mej tau noj tej zaub mov huv lub tebchaws hov, mej yuav muab tej yaam nuav xyeem rua Yawmsaub.
Muab ib qho moov qeb moov mog kws tau ntawm thawj phaum qoob loos lug ua ib lub ncuav mas muab xyeem ua yaam kws tau huv lub tshaav ntaus qoob lug.
Yuav muab cov moov qeb moov mog kws tau ntawm thawj phaum qoob lug xyeem rua Yawmsaub ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws le.
“ ‘Yog mej yuam kev tsw yog txhob txwm ua txhum es tsw coj lawv le tej lug nkaw huvsw kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe,
yog txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub has ca rua Mauxe kuas mej ua, txwj nub kws Yawmsaub pub nwg txuj kevcai hov rua mej coj ib tam dhau ib tam moog ib txhws le,

mas yog tas ua txhum kuas tsw yog txhob txwm ua hab cov pejxeem tsw paub, mas cov pejxeem suavdawg yuav muab ib tug thaav txwv nyuj ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab kws hum Yawmsaub lub sab ua ke nrug tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej kws ua kevcai laub xyeem lawv le kevcai, hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem.

Tug pov thawj yuav ua kevcai ntxuav ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg kev txhum, mas txhad zaam tau puab lub txem vem puab tsw yog txhob txwm ua txhum hab puab tub coj tsaj tuaj hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub hab muab xyeem ua kevcai daws txem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag lawm, vem yog puab ua txhum,

mas txhad zaam tau ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg tej kev txhum hab zaam tau lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob, tsua qhov ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg tau koom teg ua txhum kuas tsw yog txhob txwm ua lawm.
“ ‘Yog muaj ib tug twg ua txhum kuas tsw yog txhob txwm ua, tug hov yuav tsum muab ib tug maum tshws noob nyoog muaj ib xyoos ua kevcai daws txem.
Tug pov thawj yuav ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag rua tug kws tau ua txhum kuas tsw yog nwg txhob txwm ua, mas yuav ua kevcai ntxuav nwg kev txhum txhad zaam tau nwg lub txem.
Mej yuav muaj tuab txuj kevcai nuav rua tug kws tsw yog txhob txwm ua txhum tsw has cov Yixayee kws nyob txum tim hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob.
Tassws yog leejtwg txhob txwm ua txhum tsw has cov kws nyob txum tim hab lwm haiv tuabneeg, kuj yog tug hov saib tsw taug Yawmsaub, mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv nwg haiv tuabneeg moog.
Vem nwg tau saib tsw taug Yawmsaub tej lug hab rhuav Yawmsaub tej kevcai, mas nwg yuav raug muab txav hlo tawm moog, nwg yuav rws nwg lub txem.’ ”
Thaus cov Yixayee nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua puab pum ib tug moog khaws tawg rua nub Xanpatau.
Cov kws pum nwg khaws tawg txawm coj nwg lug rua ntawm Mauxe hab Aloo hab cov pejxeem suavdawg.
Puab txhad muab tug hov kaw ca tsua qhov tsw tau paub tseeb yuav ua le caag rua nwg.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Tug txwvneej hov yeej yuav tsum tuag. Cov pejxeem suavdawg ca le xuas pob zeb ntaus nwg rua nrau ntug zog.”
Cov pejxeem suavdawg txhad coj nwg tawm moog rua nrau ntug zog hab xuas pob zeb muab nwg ntaus kuas tuag lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Mej yuav tsum ntxhoo tw rua ntawm tej kaum qaab tsho moog ib txhab ib txhws txhua tam le. Muab ib txuj xuv xav tis rua txhua lub kaum tw tsho
sub mej txhad pum cov tw hov es txhad ncu ntsoov Yawmsaub tej lug nkaw huvsw hab ua lawv le, sub mej txhad tsw moog ua ib yaam daabtsw phem kws mej lub sab nyam hab mej lub qhov muag pheej ntshaw.
Mej txhad le ncu ntsoov hab ua lawv le kuv tej lug nkaw huvsw hab ua tuabneeg dawb huv rua mej tug Vaajtswv.
Kuv yog Yawmsaub, yog mej tug Vaajtswv kws coj mej tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug sub kuv txhad tau ua mej tug Vaajtswv. Kuv yog Yawmsaub kws yog mej tug Vaajtswv.’ ”
Khaula kws yog Ixaha tug tub, nwg yawm yog Khauha, nwg yawm koob yog Levi, hab Ntathaa hab Anpilaa kws yog Elia le tub, hab Oo kws yog Pelej tug tub, puab peb leeg yog xeem Lunpee,
mas puab coj tuabneeg moog sawv tawm tsaam Mauxe. Puab coj ib paab Yixayee muaj ob puas tswb caug leej kws ua cov pejxeem le thawj kws xaiv huv cov pejxeem lug hab yog cov kws muaj npe.

Puab tuaj txoos ua ke tawm tsaam Mauxe hab Aloo hab has rua ob tug tas, “Meb ua dhau cai lawm. Tsua qhov ib tsoom tuabneeg kuj dawb huv txhua tug, hab Yawmsaub nrug nraim puab. Ua caag meb tsaab ua luj dua Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg.?”
Thaus Mauxe nov le ntawd, nwg kuj khwb nkaus lub plhu ti nkaus aav.

Nwg has rua Khaula hab paab tuabneeg hov tas, “Pigkig sawv ntxuv Yawmsaub yuav qha kuas pum tas leejtwg yog nwg le hab leejtwg yog tug dawb huv, mas yuav kheev ca tug ntawd txaav lug ze Yawmsaub. Tug kws Yawmsaub xaiv Yawmsaub yuav kheev txaav lug ze nwg.
Yuav tsum ua le nuav. Khaula hab koj paab tuabneeg, ca le muab tej yag rau ncaig tawg lug.

Ca le rau ncaig tawg rua huv hab muab moov tshuaj tsw qaab tso rua sau cov ncaig tawg rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag rua pigkig. Tug kws Yawmsaub xaiv yuav yog tug kws dawb huv. Mej cov Levi ua dhau cai lawm.”
Mauxe has rua Khaula tas, “Mej cov Levi ca le tig ntsej noog.

Qhov kws cov Yixayee tug Vaajtswv muab mej cais tawm huv cov Yixayee lug sub txhad coj tau mej lug nyob ze nwg hab ua daag num huv Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub hab sawv taab meeg ntawm ib tsoom tuabneeg kws tuaj txoos ua ke hab ua koom rua cov Yixayee, yog ib qho miv miv xwb lov?
Nwg coj koj hab koj cov kwvtij suavdawg kws yog xeem Levi lug ze nwg los mej tseed nrhav qhov kws yuav ua pov thawj hab lov?
Qhov kws koj hab koj paab tuabneeg tuaj txoos ua ke kuj yog tawm tsaam Yawmsaub. Aloo yog leejtwg es mej yuav ywg nwg?”
Mauxe khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Ntathaa hab Anpilaa kws yog Elia le tub tuaj, tassws ob tug has tas, “Wb tsw tuaj.

Qhov kws koj coj peb tawm huv lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo lug es yuav muab peb tua pov tseg rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua yog ib qho miv miv xwb lov? Los koj tseed tsaa koj ua thawj kaav peb hab lov?

Tsw taag le ntawd koj tub tsw coj peb moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws muaj kua mig hab zwb ntaab ndwg ndo hab tsw pub teb lossws vaaj txwv maab rua peb ua qub txeeg qub teg. Koj tseed yuav muab cov tuabneeg nuav lub qhov muag kaus pov tseg hab lov? Wb tsw tuaj le.”

Mauxe txhad chim heev hab has rua Yawmsaub tas, “Thov tsw xob txais yuav tej kws puab hlawv xyeem. Kuv kuj tsw tau txeeb puab ib tug neeg luav lug yuav hab kuv tsw tau ua ib qho phem rua ib tug twg le.”
Hab Mauxe has rua Khaula tas, “Pigkig koj hab koj paab tuabneeg ca le tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, koj tug kheej hab koj paab tuabneeg hab Aloo tuaj.

Ca txhua tug nyag muab nyag lub yag rau ncaig tawg hab tso moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua huv. Mej ob puas tswb caug leej txhua tug nyag coj nyag lub yag tuaj rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag. Koj hab Aloo nyag coj nyag lub yag tuaj hab.”

Yog le nuav txhua tug nyag muab nyag lub yag hab tso ncaig tawg hab tso moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua sau cov ncaig tawg, hab puab nrug Mauxe hab Aloo sawv ntawm txujkev kws nkaag rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.

Khaula sau zog nwg paab tuabneeg ua ke tawm tsaam Mauxe hab Aloo ob tug rua ntawm txujkev kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb. Mas Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa quas ab tshwm plawg lug rua ib tsoom tuabneeg pum.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Ca le ncaim ntawm cov tuabneeg nuav moog. Tuab ntsais muag xwb kuv yuav muab puab rhuav tshem huvsw.”

Ob tug txawm khwb nkaus lub plhu ti nkaus aav, thov has tas, “Au Vaajtswv, kws yog tuabneeg suavdawg tug ntsuj plig le Vaajtswv, thaus ib tug ua txhum xwb koj yuav ca le chim rua ib tsoom tuabneeg suavdawg lov?”
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov pejxeem tas, ‘Mej ca le tswv deb ntawm Khaula hab Ntathaa hab Anpilaa tej tsev ntaub.’ ”
Tes Mauxe txawm sawv tseeg moog rua ntawm Ntathaa hab Anpilaa. Yixayee cov kev txwj quas laug kuj nrug nwg moog.

Mauxe txhad has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej ca le tswv deb ntawm cov tuabneeg phem nuav tej tsev ntaub hab xob kov puab ib yaam daabtsw le tsaam tes mej raug muab rhuav tshem vem tim puab tej kev txhum huvsw.”

Cov pejxeem txhad tswv deb ntawm Khaula hab Ntathaa hab Anpilaa tej chaw nyob mas Ntathaa hab Anpilaa kuj nrug ob tug quaspuj hab tej tub hab tej mivnyuas yau tawm lug sawv ntawm puab qhov rooj tsev ntaub.
