Hab Mauxe has tas, “Ua le nuav mej txhad paub tas Yawmsaub khaiv kuv lug ua tej num nuav huvsw tsw yog kuv ua lawv le kuv lub sab.
Yog cov tuabneeg nuav tuag yaam le luas tsoom zeej suavdawg lossws lub khuab raug puab yaam le luas tsoom zeej suavdawg, kuj tsw yog Yawmsaub khaiv kuv lug.

Tassws yog Yawmsaub ua kuas muaj ib yaam tshab tshwm lug, hab daim aav rua ncauj nqog cov tuabneeg nuav hab puab tej hov txhua chaw huvsw moog, hab puab nqeg caj tshav rua huv tub tuag teb, mas mej yuav paub tas cov tuabneeg nuav tau saib tsw taug Yawmsaub.”
Thaus nwg has tej lug nuav taag, thaaj aav kws puab sawv sau txawm tu nrho.
Daim aav rua ncauj nqog hlo puab hab puab tej tsev tuabneeg hab Khaula cov tuabneeg suavdawg hab puab tej hov txhua chaw huvsw.
Ua le nuav puab hab puab tej hov txhua chaw huvsw txhad nqeg caj tshav rua huv tub tuag teb. Daim aav kaw nkaus puab ca mas puab txhad puam tsuaj taag pluj huv ib tsoom tuabneeg.
Cov Yixayee suavdawg kws nyob ib ncig puab nov puab lub suab qw tes txawm tswv moog, hab has tas, “Ntshai tsaam lub nplajteb yuav nqog peb hab.”
Mas suavtawg tawm ntawm Yawmsaub lug hlawv ob puas tswb caug leej kws saamswm hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab xyeem hov.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le has kuas Ele‑axa kws yog pov thawj Aloo tug tub muab tej yag rau ncaig tawg rhu ntawm cov nplaim tawg rua ib qho hab muab cov ncaig tawg rheeb nyag nyob nyag, tsua qhov cov yag hov tseed dawb huv,

yog cov yag kws cov tuabneeg ntawd swv ua txhum puab txhad tuag taag lawm. Hab muab tej yag hov ntaus ua tej daim nyag nyag lu rua lub thaaj xyeem, tsua qhov tub muab cov yag hov xyeem rua Yawmsaub mas dawb huv lawm. Ua le nuav mas tej nuav yuav ua lub chaw ntaus cim rua cov Yixayee.”
Pov thawj Ele‑axa txhad muab cov yag tooj lab kws cov raug suavtawg hlawv tau swv moog xyeem hov lug ntaus ua tej daim lu rua lub thaaj xyeem,

ua lub chaw rua cov Yixayee ncu ntsoov tas tug kws tsw yog Aloo caaj ceg mas tsw xob txaav ze hlawv moov tshuaj tsw qaab xyeem rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag tsaam tes yuav zoo le Khaula hab nwg paab tuabneeg, lawv le Yawmsaub kuas Mauxe has rua Ele‑axa.
Nub tom qaab ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee suavdawg ywg Mauxe hab Aloo tas, “Meb tua Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg lawm.”

Thaus cov pejxeem tuaj txoos ua ke tawm tsaam Mauxe hab Aloo, puab tig ndag rua lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb na cav tauv fuab lug laum nkaus lub tsev ntaub hov, hab Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm lug.
Mauxe hab Aloo txhad lug rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb saab qhov rooj.
Mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le tswv tawm ntawm cov tuabneeg nuav moog, tuab ntsais muag xwb kuv yuav rhuav tshem puab.” Tes ob tug txawm khwb nkaus lub plhu ti nkaus aav.

Mauxe txhad has rua Aloo tas, “Muab koj lub yag rau ncaig tawg hab muab suavtawg ntawm lub thaaj xyeem rua huv hab tso moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua huv hab maaj nroog coj moog rua ntawm cov pejxeem ua kevcai ntxuav puab kev txhum, tsua qhov txujkev npau tawg tawm ntawm Yawmsaub tuaj lawm, tej mob phem tub chiv tshwm tuaj lawm.”

Aloo txhad muab lub yag ua lawv le Mauxe has hab dha moog rua huv plawv cov pejxeem. Mob phem tub tshwm tuaj rua cov pejxeem lawm, mas nwg rau moov tshuaj tsw qaab rua huv lub yag hab ua kevcai ntxuav cov pejxeem kev txhum.
Nwg sawv huv nruab nraab cov tuabneeg caj hab cov tuabneeg tuag, mas tej mob phem hov txhad pluj lawm.
Cov tuabneeg kws tuag tej mob phem hov muaj ib vaam plaub txheeb xyaa pua leej, tsw suav cov kws nrug Khaula tuag.
Thaus tej mob phem hov pluj lawm Aloo le rov moog cuag Mauxe rua ntawm txujkev kws nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee kuas coj txhua xeem le paas nreg tuaj, yog txhua xeem tug thawj tug paas nreg, huvsw yog kaum ob tug. Ca le sau txhua tug tswv paas hov lub npe rua nwg tug paas nreg.
Sau Aloo lub npe rua xeem Levi tug paas nreg. Txhua xeem tug thawj yuav tsum muaj ib tug paas nreg.
Koj yuav muab cov paas nreg hov tso rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb rua ntawm lub swb xaab kws rau Vaajtswv tej lug saab xubndag, yog lub chaw kws kuv ntswb mej.
Tug kws kuv xaiv lawm nwg tug paas nreg yuav hlaav nplooj, ua le nuav kuv txhad ua rua cov Yixayee lub suab ywg kws puab ywg koj ntsag moog.”

Mauxe txhad has le nuav rua cov Yixayee mas puab txhua xeem cov thawj txhua tug txhad muab ib leeg ib tug paas nreg rua Mauxe, huvsw yog kaum ob tug paas nreg. Mas Aloo tug paas nreg kuj nyob huv cov ntawd hab.
Mas Mauxe muab cov paas nreg ntawd tso rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag huv lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Vaajtswv tej lug.
Taagkig tom qaab Mauxe nkaag moog rua huv lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Vaajtswv tej lug, na cav Aloo tug paas nreg kws yog xeem Levi tug tau hlaav nplooj ua cos tawg paaj hab txw txwv duaj deg sav lawm.
Mauxe txawm coj tej paas nreg hov huvsw ntawm Yawmsaub lub xubndag lug rua cov Yixayee suavdawg. Puab tshuaj saib hab nyag txais nyag tug paas nreg lug.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le coj Aloo tug paas nreg rov moog tso rua ntawm lub swb xaab kws muaj Vaajtswv tej lug saab xubndag, muab khaws ca ua lub hom thawj rua cov kws faav xeeb, sub koj txhad tswj tau qhov kws puab ywg kuv puab txhad tsw tuag.”
Mauxe kuj ua le ntawd. Yawmsaub has kuas nwg ua le caag, nwg kuj ua lawv nraim le ntawd.
Cov Yixayee has rua Mauxe tas, “Saib maj, peb puam tsuaj, peb lamswm, peb suavdawg lamswm taag lawm.
Txhua tug kws txaav lug ze Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub yuav tuag. Peb yuav tuag taag huvsw lov?”

Yawmsaub has rua Aloo tas, “Yog ua txhum rua lub chaw kws pe hawm kuv mas koj hab koj cov tub hab koj lub xeem yuav rws lub txem. Yog ua txhum tsua qhov kws koj ua pov thawj mas koj hab koj cov tub yuav rws lub txem.

Mas koj ca le coj koj cov kwvtij kws yog xeem Levi kws yog koj yawm koob lub xeem tuaj nrug koj koom ua ke sub txhad paab tau koj rua thaus koj hab koj cov tub ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub kws muaj Vaajtswv tej lug.

Puab yuav ua koom rua koj hab ua txhua yaam num rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub, tassws tsw xob kheev puab txaav lug ze tej pestwj kws swv huv lub chaw pe hawm kuv hab lub thaaj xyeem tsaam tes puab hab mej tuag.
Puab yuav tuaj koom nrug koj hab puab yuav saib lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab tu txhua yaam num rua lub tsev ntaub. Tassws dua lwm xeem mas tsw xob kheev tuaj ze mej.
“Mej yuav tsum saib hab tu tej num ntawm lub chaw pe hawm kuv hab tej num ntawm lub thaaj xyeem sub kuv txujkev npau tawg txhad tsw poob rua sau cov Yixayee dua le lawm.
Kuv xaiv mej cov kwvtij Levi tawm huv cov Yixayee lug. Puab raug muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub hab muab pub rua mej ua tej num huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.

Mas koj hab koj cov tub yuav ua pov thawj xwb txhad ua tau txhua yaam num ntawm lub thaaj xyeem hab tej num ntawm daim ntaub thaiv saab huv. Mej yuav tsum tu tej daag num nuav. Kuv pub qhov kws ua pov thawj rua mej, mas lwm tug kws txaav lug ze yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.”

Mas Yawmsaub has rua Aloo tas, “Thaus ua kevcai xyeem rua kuv mas tej kws tsw muab hlawv xyeem kuv muab ua koj tug, yog txhua yaam dawb huv kws cov Yixayee coj tuaj xyeem. Kuv muab tej nuav tu rua koj hab koj cov tub ua mej feem moog ib txhws.

Tej kws dawb huv kawg nkaus kws tsw muab hlawv xyeem yog koj le tug. Txhua yaam kws puab muab xyeem tsw has ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, ua kevcai xyeem daws txem, ua kevcai ntxuav kev txaug kev txhum kws puab muab xyeem rua kuv, mas yog yaam kws dawb huv kawg nkaus pub rua koj hab koj cov tub.
Koj yuav tsum noj tej nuav rua huv ib qho chaw kws dawb huv kawg nkaus. Cov txwvneej txhua tug noj tau. Yog yaam kws dawb huv rua koj.

Tej nuav moog kuj yog koj le hab, yog tej kws cov Yixayee muab xyeem ua kevcai cev xyeem. Kuv muab tej nuav tu rua koj hab koj tej tub hab tej ntxhais ua puab feem moog ib txhws. Koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws huv noj tau.
Tej roj kws zoo kawg nkaus hab tej cawv txwv maab hab tej qoob loos kws zoo kawg nkaus kws yog thawj phaum kws puab coj tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub, kuv muab ua koj tug.
Txhua yaam txwv ntoo huv puab lub tebchaws kws sav thawj phaum es puab coj tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub, kuj yog koj le. Koj tsev tuabneeg txhua tug kws huv noj tau.
Txhua yaam huv cov Yixayee kws raug muab cais pub rua kuv, kuj yog koj le.

Txhua tug tub hlub kws yug huv plaab lug tsw has tuabneeg le lossws tsaj txhu le kws puab muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub kuj yog koj le. Tassws koj yuav tsum txhwv tuabneeg thawj tug mivnyuas hab yuav tsum txhwv cov tsaj txhu kws qas tsw huv thawj tug mivnyuas.
Thaus mivnyuas tuabneeg muaj ib hlis koj yuav tsum txhwv. Koj yuav tsum tu tug nqe txhwv ua tswb sekhee  nyaj, lawv le sekhee kws swv huv lub chaw pe Vaajtswv, ib sekhee yog neeg nkaum kela.

Tassws thawj tug mivnyuas nyuj lossws yaaj lossws tshws, koj tsw xob muab txhwv, vem yog yaam kws dawb huv. Koj yuav tsum muab cov ntshaav nchus rua sau lub thaaj hab muab cov roj hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab.
Tassws cov nqaj yog koj le, ib yaam le lub hauv nrob kws muab cev xyeem hab txhais ncej qaab xws kws yog koj le.

Txhua yaam dawb huv kws cov Yixayee coj tuaj xyeem rua Yawmsaub kuv muab tu rua koj hab koj tej tub tej ntxhais kws nrug koj nyob ua mej feem moog ib txhws. Nuav yog lu lug cog tseg ruaj khov  rua koj hab koj caaj ceg taab meeg Yawmsaub xubndag moog ib txhws.”

Yawmsaub has rua Aloo tas, “Koj yuav tsw tau aav ua qub txeeg qub teg rua huv lub tebchaws nuav hab koj yuav tsw nrug puab muaj feem le. Kuv yog koj le feem hab koj le qub txeeg qub teg rua huv cov Yixayee.
“Txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee pub ib feem kaum rua kuv mas kuv muab ua qub txeeg qub teg rua cov Levi ntxwv tej daag tej num kws puab ua, yog tej num kws puab ua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Txwj nuav moog cov Yixayee yuav tsw tau txaav ze lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb ntshai tsaam puab raug txem tes puab tuag.

Cov Levi yuav ua daag ua num ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb mas puab yuav tau rws tej kws puab ua txhum, yog ib txuj kevcai kws mej yuav coj txhua tam ib txhab ib txhws moog le. Puab yuav tsw muaj qub txeeg qub teg huv cov Yixayee,

tsua qhov ib feem kaum kws cov Yixayee coj tuaj pub rua Yawmsaub mas kuv tub muab pub ua qub txeeg qub teg rua cov Levi lawm. Vem le nuav kuv txhad has txug puab tas puab yuav tsw nrug cov Yixayee tau qub txeeg qub teg.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Yog le nuav ca le has rua cov Levi tas, ‘Thaus mej tau ib feem kaum ntawm cov Yixayee kws kuv muab ua qub txeeg qub teg rua mej mas mej yuav muab tej kws mej tau lug hov rhu ib feem kaum pub rov rua Yawmsaub.
Tej kws mej pub hov kuj suav ib yaam nkaus le tej kws tau huv lub tshaav ntaus qoob lug, hab tau ntawm lub rhawv tsuam kua txwv maab lug.

Ua le nuav mej kuj yuav tsum muab tej kws rhu ntawm txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee pub ib feem kaum es mej tau txais lawd rhu ib qho xyeem rua Yawmsaub, mas mej yuav muab tej kws xyeem rua Yawmsaub hov pub rua pov thawj Aloo.
Txhua yaam kws mej tau txais lawm mas tej kws mej yuav tsum muab pub rua Yawmsaub mas yuav tsum pub tej kws zoo kawg nkaus hab tej kws dawb huv xwb.’

“Mas koj yuav has rua puab tas, ‘Thaus mej tau pub tej kws zoo kawg nkaus hov mas tej kws tshuav hov yuav suav ua cov Levi le feem yaam nkaus le tej qoob kws tau huv lub tshaav ntaus qoob lug hab yaam nkaus le tej kua txwv maab kws tau ntawm lub rhawv tsuam lug.
Mej muab tej nuav noj rua lub chaw twg kuj tau, mej hab mej tsev tuabneeg noj tau, tsua qhov yog tej kws ntxwv rua tej daag tej num kws mej ua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb.
Thaus mej muab yaam kws zoo kawg nkaus pub lawm mas mej yuav tsw raug txem rua tej kws mej pub hov. Mej tsw xob ua puag tsuas cov Yixayee tej hov txhua chaw kws dawb huv tsaam tes mej tuag.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas,
“Ntawm nuav moog yog ib txuj kevcai kws Yawmsaub kuas ua. Ca le has rua cov Yixayee kuas coj ib tug maum nyuj lab kws tsw muaj chaw thuaj le hab tsw tau hai dua tsheb tuaj rua koj.
Meb yuav muab tug nyuj hov rua pov thawj Ele‑axa, mas muab caab rua nrau lub zog hab muab tua kag rua ntawm Ele‑axa xubndag.
Pov thawj Ele‑axa yuav muab nwg ntiv teg raus cov ntshaav nyuj nchus rua ntawm lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb saab nub tuaj xyaa zag.
Puab yuav muab tug maum nyuj hlawv taab meeg Ele‑axa, hlawv daim tawv tej nqaj tej ntshaav tej quav huvsw.
Tug pov thawj yuav muab mivntswv ntoo cab hab zaub txwg theem hab xuv lab nrum rua huv cub suavtawg kws hlawv tug nyuj hov,
mas tug pov thawj le ntxhua nwg cev tsoog tsho hab daa dej le maav moog rua huv lub zog. Tug pov thawj yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj.
Tug kws hlawv tug maum nyuj hov los yuav ntxhua nwg cev tsoog tsho hab daa dej, nwg yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj.

Ib tug txwvneej kws huv yuav tsum moog yawm tej tshauv kws hlawv tug maum nyuj hov coj lug rua lub chaw kws huv saab nrau lub zog, mas muab cov tshauv hov khaws ca rua ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg swv ua dej ua kevcai ntxuav kev phem kev qas hab ntxuav lub txem.

Tug kws yawm cov tshauv kws hlawv tug maum nyuj hov yuav ntxhua nwg cev tsoog tsho, nwg yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj. Nuav yog ib txuj kevcai kws cov Yixayee hab lwm haiv tuabneeg kws nrug mej nyob yuav tsum coj moog ib txhab ib txhws le.
“Leejtwg kov tej cev tuag mas yuav qas tsw huv xyaa nub.
Nub kws peb hab nub kws xyaa nwg yuav muab cov dej hov lug ua kevcai ntxuav nwg txhad le huv. Yog nwg tsw ua kevcai ntxuav rua nub peb hab nub xyaa nwg yuav qas tsw huv.

Leejtwg kov tej tuag, yog kov raug tej tuag lub cev es tsw ua kevcai ntxuav mas tug hov ua puag tsuas Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub lawm, mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv cov Yixayee moog, tsua qhov nwg tsw tau muab cov dej kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev phem kev qas lug nduav nwg, nwg txhad qas tsw huv, nwg kev qas tseed lu nwg.
“Ntawm nuav moog yog tej kevcai kws yuav coj rua thaus ib tug tuag rua huv lub tsev ntaub. Txhua tug kws nkaag rua huv tsev hab txhua tug kws nyob huv tsev yuav qas tsw huv xyaa nub.
Txhua lub pestwj taig kws tsw muaj hau vuv kuj qas tsw huv.
Yog leejtwg moog rua saab nrau lub zog moog kov raug tej tuabneeg kws raug ntaaj tuag lossws tej cev tuag lossws pob txhaa tuabneeg lossws qhov ntxaa mas tug hov yuav qas tsw huv xyaa nub.
Tug kws qas tsw huv nuav mas yuav muab cov tshauv kws hlawv tug nyuj xyeem daws txem hab muab dej cag laub xyaw rua huv lub phaaj.

Ib tug kws huv yuav muab ib re nplooj zaub txwg theem raus cov dej hov nchus rua lub tsev ntaub hab tej pestwj kws swv huvsw hab nchus rua tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv hab nchus rua tug kws moog kov pob txhaa lossws kov tug raug tua tuag lossws tej cev tuag lossws lub qhov ntxaa.

Tug kws huv hov yuav muab nchus rua tug kws qas tsw huv rua nub kws peb hab nub kws xyaa. Ua le nuav mas nub kws xyaa yuav ua kevcai ntxuav tug hov kuas huv mas tug hov yuav ntxhua nwg cev tsoog tsho hab daa dej, thaus tsaus ntuj nwg txhad le huv.

“Tug kws qas tsw huv es tsw ua kevcai ntxuav mas tug hov yuav raug muab txav tawm huv ib tsoom Yixayee moog tsua qhov nwg ua puag tsuas lub chaw pe Yawmsaub. Vem nwg tsw tau muab cov dej kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev phem kev qas lug nduav nwg, nwg txhad qas tsw huv.

Nuav yog ib txuj kevcai kws puab yuav coj ib txhab ib txhws moog le. Tug kws muab cov dej kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev qas hov nchus kuj yuav ntxhua nwg cev tsoog tsho. Tug kws kov cov dej kws ntxuav kev qas hov nwg kuj yuav qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj.
Tug kws qas tsw huv kov raug yaam twg mas yaam ntawd kuj qas tsw huv. Hab leejtwg kov raug yaam ntawd nwg kuj qas tsw huv moog txug tsaus ntuj hab.”
Ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg lug txug tebchaws moj saab qhua Xee rua lub ib hlis, hab puab tsuam chaw nyob ntawm Khante. Tes Mili‑aa txawm tuag hab muab log rua hov ntawd.
Qhov chaw ntawd cov pejxeem tsw muaj dej haus, puab txhad tuaj txoos ua ke tawm tsaam Mauxe hab Aloo.
Puab nrug Mauxe sws caav has tas, “Thaus peb cov kwvtij tuag taag rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag, ca peb tuag hab kuj zoo dua.
Ua caag koj coj Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg lug rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav es peb hab peb tej tsaj txhu yuav tuag taag rua ntawm nuav?
Ua caag koj coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws, coj peb lug rua lub chaw phem nuav? Tsw muaj qoob loos tsw muaj txwv cua tsw muaj txwv maab tsw muaj txwv ntsab pobkws hab tsw muaj dej haus hlo le.”
Tes Mauxe hab Aloo txawm tawm ntawm cov pejxeem moog rua ntawm lub qhov rooj tsev ntaub sws ntswb hab khwb nkaus rua huv aav. Yawmsaub tug fwjchim ci ntsaa ab tshwm rua ob tug,
mas Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,

“Ca le coj tug paas nreg, hab koj hab koj tug tijlaug Aloo hu cov pejxeem tuaj ua ke. Meb ca le has rua phaab zeb taab meeg puab kuas txhawv dej lug. Ua le nuav koj txhad muab tau dej ntawm phaab zeb lug rua ib tsoom pejxeem hab puab tej tsaj txhu haus.”
Mauxe txawm coj tug paas nreg ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag moog, lawv le Yawmsaub tau has rua nwg.

Mauxe hab Aloo txhad hu cov pejxeem tuaj ua ke rua ntawm phaab zeb hab Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Mej cov nam tuabneeg faav xeeb, ca le tig ntsej noog. Yuav ca ib ua dej txhawv huv phaab zeb nuav lug rua mej lov?”
Mauxe txawm tsaa teg hlo xuas paas nreg ntaus phaab zeb hov ob nplawm. Tes dej txawm txhawv lug hlub hlub, mas cov pejxeem hab puab tej tsaj txhu txhad tau dej haus.

Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe hab Aloo tas, “Vem meb tsw ntseeg kuv tsw fwm kuv ua tug dawb huv taab meeg cov Yixayee, vem le nuav meb yuav tsw tau coj cov pejxeem nuav moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv tub muab rua puab lawm.”
Cov dej hov yog cov dej Melinpa,  yog qhov chaw kws puab nrug Yawmsaub sws caav hab Yawmsaub tau ua nwg txujkev dawb huv tshwm rua huv plawv puab.
Mauxe tso tuabneeg xaa xuv ntawm Khante moog has rua Entoo tug vaajntxwv tas, “Koj tug kwvtij Yixayee has le nuav tas, Koj yeej paub txug tej kev txom nyem kws peb raug lawm.
Peb tej laug tau tswv moog rua Iyi tebchaws hab peb nyob huv Iyi tebchaws ntev heev. Cov Iyi tswm txom peb hab peb tej laug.

Mas thaus peb quaj rua Yawmsaub, nwg kuj nov peb lub suab hab khaiv ib tug tubkhai ntuj lug hab nwg coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws, mas nwgnuav peb lug nyob ntawm lub moos Khante kws npuas koj nrwm teb.

Thov ca peb hlaa koj lub tebchaws moog. Peb yuav tsw hlaa huv koj tej laj teb lossws huv koj tej vaaj txwv maab, hab peb yuav tsw haus koj tej qhov dej. Peb yuav taug Vaajntxwv Txuj nam Kev Luj xwb, peb yuav tsw tig moog rua saab xws lossws moog rua saab txhum phem, moog txug thaus peb hlaa dhau koj lub tebchaws.”
Tassws Entoo tug vaajntxwv has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj hlaa tsw tau hlo le, yog koj tuaj kuv yuav xuas ntaaj tiv koj.”

Cov Yixayee has rua Entoo tug vaajntxwv tas, “Peb yuav taug txuj nam kev luj xwb. Yog peb haus koj cov dej, tsw has peb hab peb tej tsaj txhu, peb yuav them nqe rua koj. Thov koj ca peb xuas kwtaw hlaa moog, tsuas yog le nuav xwb.”
Tassws nwg teb tas, “Mej hlaa moog tsw tau le.” Cov Entoo txawm txhwj tub rog coob muaj zug heev tuaj tawm tsaam puab.
Yog le nuav Entoo txhad tsw kheev Yixayee hlaa nwg lub tebchaws, cov Yixayee txhad zos ntawm nwg moog lawm.
Ib tsoom Yixayee suavdawg txhad tawm ntawm Khante lug txug lub roob Hau.
Ntawm lub roob Hau nuav Yawmsaub txhad has rua Mauxe hab Aloo ntawm Entoo nrwm teb tas,

“Aloo yuav raug coj moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob. Nwg yuav tsw tau moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws kuv muab rua cov Yixayee, tsua qhov meb ob leeg faav xeeb tej lug kws kuv has rua meb ntawm cov dej Melinpa.
Ca le coj Aloo hab nwg tug tub Ele‑axa moog rua sau lub roob Hau.
Mas hle Aloo cev tsoog muab rua nwg tug tub Ele‑axa naav. Aloo yuav raug coj moog nrug nwg tej laug nyob, nwg yuav tuag rua hov ntawd.”
Mauxe kuj ua lawv Yawmsaub has. Puab txhad nce moog rua sau lub roob Hau taab meeg cov pejxeem suavdawg.
Tes Mauxe txawm hle Aloo cev tsoog muab rua nwg tug tub Ele‑axa naav, tes Aloo txawm tu sav rua sau lub ncov roob hov lawm. Tes Mauxe hab Ele‑axa txhad nqeg sau lub roob lug.
Thaus cov pejxeem suavdawg pum tas Aloo tuag lawm, cov Yixayee suavdawg quaj ntsuag Aloo tau peb caug nub.
Thaus cov Khana‑aa tug vaajntxwv kws kaav lub moos Alaj kws nyob huv Neke  nov tas cov Yixayee saamswm taug txujkev Athali lug, nwg txawm ua rog rua cov Yixayee hab nteg tau qee leej coj moog lawm.
Mas cov Yixayee cog lug rua Yawmsaub tas, “Yog koj muab cov tuabneeg nuav rua huv peb txhais teg mas peb yuav muab puab tej moos ua kuas puam tsuaj huvsw le.”

Yawmsaub kuj noog cov Yixayee lub suab thov, nwg txhad muab cov Khana‑aa rua huv puab txhais teg. Puab txhad muab cov Khana‑aa hab puab tej moos ua puam tsuaj taag huvsw, mas txhad hu thaaj chaw hov hu ua Hauma.
Puab tawm ntawm roob Hau taug txujkev kws moog rua Havtxwv Lab sub txhad zos dhau Entoo tebchaws moog. Thaus puab saamswm taug kev cov pejxeem ua tsw tau sab ntev.

Cov pejxeem txhad thuaj ywg Vaajtswv hab Mauxe has tas, “Ua le caag meb yuav coj peb tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug tuag rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua nuav? Vem tsw muaj mov noj tsw muaj dej haus, hab peb dhuav tej zaub mov kws tsw muaj qaabhau nuav hwv lawm.”
Yawmsaub txhad tso naab muaj taug heev lug rua huv cov Yixayee mas cov naab tum puab, cov Yixayee txhad tuag coob heev.

Cov pejxeem txhad tuaj cuag Mauxe hab has tas, “Peb tau ua txhum vem peb tau thuaj ywg Yawmsaub hab koj. Thov koj thov Yawmsaub muab cov naab nuav coj tawm ntawm peb moog.” Mauxe txhad thov Yawmsaub paab cov pejxeem.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Koj ca le ua ib tug naab muaj taug muab teem rua sau ib tug ncej. Txhua tug kws raug naab tum thaus puab tsaa muag saib tug naab hov mas puab yuav caj sa nyob.”
Tes Mauxe txawm muab tooj lab ua ib tug naab teem rua sau ib tug ncej. Yog leejtwg raug naab tum es nwg tsaa muag saib tug naab tooj hov nwg txhad muaj txujsa nyob.
Cov Yixayee sawv kev moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Aunpau.
Puab tsua sawv kev ntawm Aunpau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Iye‑anpali huv tebchaws moj saab qhua kws ncaaj Mau‑a saab nub tuaj.
Puab tsua sawv kev hov ntawd moog tsuam chaw nyob rua huv lub haav Xelej.

Puab tsua sawv kev hov ntawd moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm tug dej Anoo saab tid kws yog nyob huv tebchaws moj saab qhua huv cov Amaulai lub tebchaws, tsua qhov tug dej Anoo yog Mau‑a tug nrwm teb, yog nyob Mau‑a hab Amaulai ntu nruab nraab.
Vem le nuav huv phoo ntawv kws has txug Yawmsaub ua rog txhad muaj has tas, “Vahe huv Xufa, hab tej kwj haav ntawm Anoo,
hab tej hauv haav moog txug ncua lub moos A hab nthuav moog txug Mau‑a nrwm teb.”
Puab tawm hov ntawd moog txug Npe‑aw kws yog lub qhov dej kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Ca le sau cov pejxeem lug ua ke, kuv yuav pub dej rua puab.”
Cov Yixayee txhad hu zaaj nkauj nuav has tas, “Lub qhov dej ca le txhawv dej lug, ca peb hu nkauj,
yog lub qhov dej kws cov thawj khawb ca, yog lub kws cov kws ua hlub khawb tseg, puab swv tej cwj nreg hab tej paas nreg.” Puab tsua tawm ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua moog txug Mathana,
hab tawm ntawm Mathana moog txug Nahali‑ee, hab tawm ntawm Nahali‑ee moog txug Npamauj,
hab tawm ntawm Npamauj moog txug lub haav huv Mau‑a tebchaws ze hauv roob Pixaka kws saib ntsoov rua ntuj nraag teb do.
Cov Yixayee khaiv tuabneeg moog cuag Xihoo kws yog cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv mas has tas,

“Thov ca peb hlaa koj lub tebchaws moog. Peb yuav tsw nkaag rua huv koj tej laj teb koj tej vaaj txwv maab, peb yuav tsw haus koj tej qhov dej. Peb yuav taug Vaajntxwv Txuj nam Kev Luj moog kuas dhau plhawv koj lub tebchaws.”
Tassws Xihoo tsw kheev cov Yixayee hlaa nwg lub tebchaws. Nwg txhwj tub rog tuaj tawm tsaam cov Yixayee huv tebchaws moj saab qhua, nwg tuaj nrug cov Yixayee ntaus rog ntawm Yahaj.
Cov Yixayee xuas ntaaj tua nwg tuag hab txeeb tau nwg lub tebchaws txwj ntawm tug dej Anoo moog txug ncua dej Yanpo moog ti nkaus Aamoo nrwm teb, vem Aamoo nrwm teb ruaj khov.
Cov Yixayee txeeb tau tej moos nuav huvsw hab cov Yixayee moog nyob huv cov Amaulai txhua lub moos hab nyob huv lub nroog Hesanpoo hab nyob thoob plhawv tej zej zog.
Hesanpoo yog cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo lub nroog luj. Nwg yog tug kws ua rog rua cov Mau‑a tug vaajntxwv kws kaav ua nwg ntej hab nwg txeeb tau Mau‑a tebchaws huvsw moog txug ncua tug dej Anoo.
Vem le nuav cov kws txawj phim lug txaj txhad has tas, “Ca le tuaj rua Hesanpoo, tuaj rhawv tuaj tswm khu Xihoo lub nroog,
vem yog muaj suavtawg tawm huv Hesanpoo, muaj nplaim tawg tawm huv Xihoo lub nroog moog kub Mau‑a lub moos A hab cov kws ua hlub huv tej roob Anoo puam tsuaj taag.

Mau‑a 'e, koj yuav raug txom nyem lauj, Khemauj cov tuabneeg 'e, mej yuav raug puam tsuaj lauj! Khemauj tau ua rua nwg tej tub tswv nplaam tebchaws taag, hab ua rua nwg tej ntxhais poob rua huv Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo teg.
Peb tub tua puab pov tseg huvsw. Hesanpoo puam tsuaj moog txug ncua Ntinpoo. Peb rhuav tshem puab moog txug ncua Naufa hab txug ncua Mentenpa. ”
Yog le nuav cov Yixayee txhad tau nyob huv cov Amaulai lub tebchaws.
Mas Mauxe khaiv tuabneeg moog tshuaj lub moos Yaxaw, hab puab kuj txeeb tau tej zej zog ib ncig hov hab muab cov Amaulai kws nyob huv lawv tswv moog.
Puab tig hlo taug txujkev kws moog peg Npasaa mas Npasaa tug vaajntxwv Aus hab nwg cov pejxeem suavdawg kuj tawm tuaj ua rog rua ntawm Ente‑i.

Tassws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas, “Tsw xob ntshai nwg tsua qhov kuv tub muab nwg rua huv koj txhais teg, muab hlo nwg cov pejxeem hab nwg lub tebchaws huvsw, mas koj yuav ua rua nwg ib yaam nkaus le koj tub ua rua cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo kws nyob huv Hesanpoo.”
Puab txhad le tua Aus hab nwg cov tub hab nwg cov pejxeem suavdawg tsw tshuav ib tug le. Puab txhad txeeb hlo nwg lub tebchaws.
Cov Yixayee txawm tshais chaw moog tsuam chaw nyob huv lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee saab nub tuaj kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau.
Npalaj kws yog Xipau tug tub kuj pum txhua yaam kws cov Yixayee tau ua rua cov Amaulai.
Cov Mau‑a ntshai haiv tuabneeg hov heev kawg tsua qhov puab coob heev, cov Mau‑a ntshai cov Yixayee heev ua tshee quas nyo.

Cov Mau‑a txhad has rua Mintee cov thawj tas, “Nwgnuav paab nam tuabneeg coob nuav yuav noj txhua yaam ib ncig peb taag yaam nkaus le nyuj noj zaub huv teb.” Yog le nuav, Npalaj kws yog Xipau tug tub kws ua vaajntxwv huv Mau‑a tebchaws rua lub swjhawm hov,

txhad khaiv tuabneeg moog hu Npala‑aa kws yog Npe‑au tug tub ntawm lub moos Pethau kws nyob ze tug dej Yufeti huv lub tebchaws kws yug nwg has tas, “Saib maj, ib haiv tuabneeg tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, nkaag puv nkaus lub nplajteb lawm. Puab tuaj nyob ti nkaus ntawm kuv lawm.

Thov koj tuaj paab kuv tsawm foom haiv tuabneeg hov, tsua qhov puab muaj zug heev dhau kuv. Tej zag kuv yuav ntaus yeej puab hab lawv tau puab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog. Kuv yeej paub tas koj foom koob moov rua tug twg tug hov yuav tau koob moov, hab koj tsawm foom tug twg tug hov yuav raug tej lug foom tsw zoo hov.”
Mau‑a cov thawj hab Mintee cov thawj txhad coj ib co nqe ndav tsawm foom moog. Puab tuaj txug Npala‑aa hab has Npalaj tej lug rua Npala‑aa.
Npala‑aa has rua puab tas, “Mo nuav mej pw ntawm nuav, mas Yawmsaub has le caag rua kuv, kuv le coj tej lug hov lug qha rua mej.” Mau‑a cov thawj txhad le nrug Npala‑aa nyob ntawd.
Mas Vaajtswv lug has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Cov tuabneeg kws nrug koj nyob yog leejtwg?”
Npala‑aa teb Vaajtswv tas, “Mau‑a tug vaajntxwv Npalaj kws yog Xipau tug tub khaiv puab tuaj has rua kuv tas,

‘Saib maj, ib haiv tuabneeg tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, nkaag puv nkaus lub nplajteb lawm. Thov koj tuaj paab kuv tsawm foom haiv tuabneeg hov. Tej zag kuv yuav ntaus yeej puab hab lawv tau puab tawm huv lub tebchaws moog.’ ”
Vaajtswv has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Koj tsw xob nrug puab moog. Tsw xob tsawm foom cov tuabneeg hov tsua qhov kuv tub foom koob moov rua puab lawm.”
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Npala‑aa kuj sawv lug has rua Npalaj cov tim xyoob tas, “Mej ca le rov qaab moog rua mej teb mej chaw, tsua qhov Yawmsaub tsw kheev kuv nrug mej moog.”
Yog le hov Mau‑a cov thawj txhad sawv tseeg rov moog cuag Npalaj hab has tas, “Npala‑aa tsw kaam nrug peb tuaj.”
Npalaj txhad khaiv dua ib co tim xyoob coob dua hab muaj meej mom luj dua thawj paab rov qaab moog.
Puab tuaj txug Npala‑aa hab has rua nwg tas, “Npalaj kws yog Xipau tug tub has le nuav tas, ‘Tsw xob ca muaj ib yaam daabtsw taab kaum qhov kws koj tuaj cuag kuv.
Kuv yeej yuav muab koj saib hlub, koj xaav kuas kuv ua daabtsw kuv yeej yuav ua le ntawd. Thov koj tuaj paab kuv tsawm foom haiv tuabneeg ntawd.’ ”

Tassws Npala‑aa teb Npalaj cov tim xyoob tas, “Txawm yog Npalaj yuav muab nwg lub tsev kws muaj nyaj muaj kub puv nkaus rua kuv los kuv yuav ua tsw tau ib yaam daabtsw dhau tej kws Yawmsaub kws yog kuv tug Vaajtswv kuas kuv ua, tsw has luj los miv.
Thov mej pw ib mos ntawm nuav tsaiv sub kuv txhad le paub tas Yawmsaub has daabtsw tsaav ntxwv rua kuv.”
Mas Vaajtswv lug has rua Npala‑aa mo ntawd tas, “Yog cov tuabneeg hov tuaj hu koj, koj ca le sawv tseeg nrug puab moog, tassws koj yuav tsum ua lawv le kws kuv has rua koj xwb.”
Taagkig sawv ntxuv Npala‑aa txhad sawv pem eeb rua nwg tug neeg luav nrug Mau‑a cov thawj moog.
Tassws Vaajtswv npau tawg tsua qhov kws Npala‑aa moog, mas Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj txhad lug sawv taav Npala‑aa kev tawm tsaam nwg. Npala‑aa caij neeg luav hab muaj ob tug tub qhe nrug nwg moog.

Thaus tug neeg luav pum Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj tuav rawv ntaaj sawv huv txujkev, neeg luav txawm zos hlo rua tom ntug kev moog rua tom daim teb. Mas Npala‑aa nplawm tug neeg luav rov qaab lug taug txujkev.
Tes Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj txawm moog sawv rua ntu kev nqaim kws muaj ob saab ntsaa loog xov tej vaaj txwv maab thaiv ob saab kev.
Thaus tug neeg luav pum Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj, tes txawm zaam moog ti nkaus ntsaa loog tais Npala‑aa txhais kwtaw rua ntawm ntsaa loog. Npala‑aa kuj rov nplawm tug neeg luav dua.
Mas Yawmsaub tug tubkhai tsua moog sawv rua tom hauv ntej kws kev nqaim heev tsw tau chaw zaam rua saab xws los saab phem le.
Thaus tug neeg luav pum Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj tes txawm txhus caug ndua, Npala‑aa tseed caij sau nraus qaum. Npala‑aa npau tawg heev txhad xuas nwg tug paas nreg nplawm tug neeg luav.
Mas Yawmsaub qheb neeg luav qhov ncauj, neeg luav txhad has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Kuv ua le caag rua koj es koj ntaus kuv peb zag le nuav?”
Npala‑aa has rua neeg luav tas, “Vem koj txhob txwm zwg kuv. Yog muaj ntaaj nyob huv kuv txhais teg nwgnuav tes kuv tub muab koj tua kag lawm.”

Tug neeg luav has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Kuv tsw yog koj tug neeg luav kws koj naj nub caij taag koj swm neej lug txug naj nub nwgnuav lov? Kuv txeev ua le nuav rua koj lov?” Npala‑aa teb tas, “Tsw txeev ua.”
Tes taamswm ntawd Yawmsaub qheb Npala‑aa lub qhov muag, nwg txhad pum Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj tuav rawv ntaaj sawv huv txujkev. Npala‑aa txawm nyo hau khwb nkaus huv aav.
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Ua caag koj ntaus koj tug neeg luav peb zag le nuav? Tub yog kuv tuaj taav koj vem koj kwv tawv kuv, taug txujkev nuav.
Tug neeg luav pum kuv mas zos kuv peb zag. Yog nwg tsw zos ntawm kuv tes puam taab kuv tub muab koj tua lawm es ca tug neeg luav dim.”

Tes Npala‑aa txawm has rua Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj tas, “Kuv tau ua txhum muaj txem lawm tsua qhov kuv tsw paub tas koj sawv huv txujkev taav kuv. Yog le ntawd, nwgnuav yog koj tsw pum zoo tes kuv yuav rov qaab moog.”
Yawmsaub tug tubkhai ntuj has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Ca le nrug cov txwvneej hov moog, tassws koj yuav tsum has tej lug kws kuv kuas koj has xwb.” Npala‑aa txhad nrug Npalaj cov tim xyoob moog.
Thaus Npalaj nov tas Npala‑aa tuaj lawm nwg txawm moog tog Npala‑aa rua ntawm Mau‑a lub moos kws ti nkaus nrwm teb kws muaj tug dej Anoo ua nrwm teb.
Npalaj has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Kuv tub tso tuabneeg tuaj hu koj los tsw yog? Ua caag koj tsw tuaj cuag kuv? Kuv tsw muaj peevxwm muab koj saib hlub lov?”
Npala‑aa has rua Npalaj tas, “Kuv tub tuaj txug koj lawm nev. Nwgnuav kuv yuav has tau daabtsw? Kuv yuav tsum has tej lug kws Vaajtswv muab tso rua huv kuv lub qhov ncauj xwb.”
Tes Npala‑aa txawm nrug Npalaj moog txug lub moos Khiliya Huxau.
Tes Npalaj txawm muab nyuj hab yaaj tua xyeem hab muab ib txha rua Npala‑aa hab cov tim xyoob kws nrug nwg ua ke.
Nub tom qaab Npalaj kuj coj Npala‑aa nce moog rua peg lub roob Npamau Npa‑aa, nyob qhov chaw ntawd nwg saib pum cov Yixayee ib txha.
Npala‑aa has rua Npalaj tas, “Koj ca le ua xyaa lub thaaj xyeem rua kuv swv hab npaaj xyaa tug txwv nyuj xyaa tug txwv yaaj rua kuv ntawm nuav.”
Npalaj ua lawv le Npala‑aa has, mas Npalaj hab Npala‑aa muab ib tug txwv nyuj nrug ib tug txwv yaaj xyeem rua sau txhua lub thaaj.

Mas Npala‑aa has rua Npalaj tas, “Koj ca le moog sawv rua ntawm tej kws koj muab hlawv xyeem ib saab es kuv yuav moog. Tej zag Yawmsaub yuav lug ntswb kuv. Mas nwg qha yaam twg rua kuv, kuv yuav has rua koj.” Tes Npala‑aa txawm nce moog rua sau lub ncov roob do hau.
Vaajtswv lug ntswb Npala‑aa hab Npala‑aa has rua Vaajtswv tas, “Kuv ua xyaa lub thaaj xyeem hab muab ib tug txwv nyuj hab ib tug txwv yaaj xyeem rua sau txhua lub thaaj.”
Yawmsaub muab lug rua huv Npala‑aa lub qhov ncauj hab has tas, “Ca le rov moog cuag Npalaj hab has tej lug nuav rua nwg.”
Npala‑aa txhad rov lug cuag Npalaj, mas Npalaj hab Mau‑a cov thawj tseed sawv ntsug ntawm tej kws muab hlawv xyeem ib saab.

Npala‑aa txhad ua lug zaaj lug zuag cev lug has tas, “Npalaj tau coj kuv tuaj ntawm Alaa tebchaws tuaj, Mau‑a tug vaajntxwv coj kuv tuaj peg tej roob kws nyob saab nub tuaj tuaj, ‘Ca le tuaj paab kuv tsawm foom Yakhauj hab thuaj Yixayee.’
Kuv yuav tsawm foom tug kws Vaajtswv tsw foom tau le caag? Kuv yuav thuaj tug kws Yawmsaub tsw thuaj tau le caag?
Kuv nyob sau roob tsuas pum puab, kuv nyob sau ncov roob saib ntsoov puab. Saib maj, ib haiv tuabneeg nwg nyob nwg ib caag xwb, tsw suav rua huv lwm haiv tuabneeg.

Leejtwg yuav suav txheeb tej moov aav huv Yakhauj lossws suav txheeb cov Yixayee ib feem huv plaub? Thov ca kuv tuag yaam le tug tuabneeg ncaaj nceeg, hab thov ca kuv lub neej thaus kawg zoo ib yaam le puab.”
Tes Npalaj txawm has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Koj tau ua daabtsw rua kuv? Kuv hu koj tuaj tsawm foom kuv cov yeeb ncuab, tassws koj tsuas yog foom koob moov rua puab xwb.”
Npala‑aa txawm teb tas, “Kuv yuav tsum ceev faaj has tej lug kws Yawmsaub muab rua huv kuv lub qhov ncauj los tsw yog?”

Mas Npalaj has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Koj nrug kuv moog dua rua ib qho chaw kws saib pum ntsoov puab, tassws koj yuav pum puab ib txha xwb, yuav tsw pum taag nrho huvsw. Koj tuaj qhov chaw ntawd paab kuv tsawm foom puab.”

Tes Npalaj txawm coj Npala‑aa moog txug Xaufi daim teb nce moog txug lub ncov roob Pixaka, mas nwg tib xyaa lub thaaj xyeem hab muab ib tug txwv nyuj nrug ib tug txwv yaaj tua xyeem rua sau txhua lub thaaj.
Npala‑aa has rua Npalaj tas, “Koj ca le sawv ntawm tej kws koj muab hlawv xyeem hov ib saab rua thaus kuv moog cuag Yawmsaub tim u.”
Mas Yawmsaub lug ntswb Npala‑aa hab muab lug rua huv Npala‑aa lub qhov ncauj has tas, “Ca le rov qaab moog cuag Npalaj hab has tej lug nuav rua nwg.”
Npala‑aa txhad rov lug cuag Npalaj, mas Npalaj hab Mau‑a cov thawj tseed sawv ntsug ntawm tej kws muab hlawv xyeem ib saab. Npalaj txhad nug nwg has tas, “Yawmsaub has le caag?”
Npala‑aa txhad ua lug zaaj lug zuag cev lug has tas, “Npalaj ca le sawv tseeg tig ntsej noog, Xipau tug tub 'e, ca le noog kuv has.

Vaajtswv tsw yog tuabneeg kws yuav has daag, nwg tsw yog tuabneeg le tub kws yuav ntxeev dua sab. Nwg tub has lawm, nwg yuav tsw ua lawv le ntawd lov? Nwg tub cog lug tseg lawm, nwg yuav tsw ua kuas tav lov?
Vaajtswv kuas kuv foom koob moov. Nwg tub foom koob moov lawm, kuv muab thim tsw tau.
Tsw pum muaj kev txom nyem lug rua Yakhauj, hab tsw pum muaj kev ceblaaj lug rua Yixayee. Yawmsaub kws yog puab tug Vaajtswv nrug nraim puab, hab muaj suab qw tas ib tug vaajntxwv nyob huv puab.
Vaajtswv coj puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, nwg zoo yaam nkaus le tug kub nyuj qus rua puab.
Tsw muaj kev tso daab tum Yakhauj, tsw muaj kev saib yaig saib swj txuv Yixayee. Nwgnuav luas yuav has txug Yaukauj hab Yixayee tas, ‘Saib Vaajtswv tau ua le caag lawm.’

“Saib maj, ib haiv tuabneeg sawv tseeg yaam nkaus tug maum tsuv ntxhuav, hab sawv ntsug yaam nkaus tug txwv tsuv ntxhuav, tsw yeem pw moog txug thaus kws noj tug qauv, hab haus tej kws nwg tum tau le ntshaav.”
Tes Npalaj txawm has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Tsw xob tsawm foom hab tsw xob foom koob moov rua puab hlo le.”
Mas Npala‑aa teb Npalaj tas, “Kuv tub has rua koj tas, Txhua yaam kws Yawmsaub has, kuv yuav tsum ua lawv nraim, los tsw yog?”
Npalaj txawm has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Ca le nrug kuv moog, kuv yuav coj koj moog dua rua ib qho chaw. Tej zag Vaajtswv yuav txaus sab ca koj tuaj qhov chaw ntawd paab kuv tsawm foom puab.”
Npalaj txawm coj Npala‑aa moog txug lub ncov roob Pe‑au kws saib ntsoov rua ntuj nraag teb do.
Npala‑aa has rua Npalaj tas, “Koj ua xyaa lub thaaj xyeem rua kuv swv hab npaaj xyaa tug txwv nyuj xyaa tug txwv yaaj rua kuv ntawm nuav.”
Npalaj txawm ua lawv le Npala‑aa has, mas muab ib tug txwv nyuj nrug ib tug txwv yaaj xyeem rua sau txhua lub thaaj.
Thaus Npala‑aa pum tas Yawmsaub txaus sab foom koob moov rua Yixayee, tes nwg tsw moog saib yaig saib swj le yaav taag lug lawm, nwg ca le saib ntsoov rua tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Nwg tsaa muag saib pum cov Yixayee tsuam chaw nyob ib xeem nyob ua ib pawg. Mas Vaajtswv tug Ntsuj Plig lug kaav nwg lub sab,
nwg txawm ua lug zaaj lug zuag cev lug has tas, “Nuav yog Npe‑au tug tub Npala‑aa tej lug, yog tug kws lub qhov muag pum tseeb lawm tej lug,
yog tug kws nov Vaajtswv tej lug le lug. Nwg ua yug quas toog pum tug kws muaj fwjchim luj kawg nkaus, hab nwg qaug lawm tassws nwg lub qhov muag pum tseeb.
Yakauj 'e, koj tej tsev ntaub zoo nkauj kawg le lauj! Yixayee 'e, koj tej zej zog kuj zoo nkauj lauj!.
Yaam nkaus le tej haav kws nthuav daav, hab zoo yaam le lub vaaj kws nyob ntawm ntug dej, hab zoo yaam le tej ntoo tsw qaab kws Yawmsaub cog ca, hab yaam le tej ntoo cab kws nyob ntawm ntug dej.
Dej yuav ndwg huv puab tej thoob lug, puab tej tub ki yuav muaj dej ntau. Puab tug vaajntxwv yuav luj dua vaajntxwv Aka, hab puab lub tebchaws yuav vaam meej.
Vaajtswv coj puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug, puab zoo yaam nkaus le tug kub nyuj qus. Puab yuav noj tej tebchaws kws ua yeeb ncuab, hab muab tej pob txhaa luv ua tej ywb yaav, hab tua xub chob luas.

Puab plab lua pw yaam le tug txwv tsuv ntxhuav hab yaam le tug maum tsuv ntxhuav. Leejtwg yuav kaav tsaa kuas puab sawv? Thov ca tug kws foom koob moov rua mej tau koob moov, thov ca tug kws tsawm foom mej raug tsawm foom.”
Npalaj txawm npau tawg rua Npala‑aa, txhad npuaj teg hab has rua Npala‑aa tas, “Kuv hu koj tuaj tsawm foom kuv cov yeeb ncuab, tassws koj foom koob moov rua puab peb zag lawm.
Koj ca le tswv rov moog rua koj vaaj koj tsev. Kuv tub has rua koj tas, Kuv yeej yuav muab koj saib hlub, tassws Yawmsaub taav tsw kheev koj tau lawm.”

Mej yuav naj nub muab xyeem kuas puv xyaa nub, yog tej zaub mov kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab. Yuav muab tej nuav xyeem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
Nub kws xyaa mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav hlo le.’ ”

“ ‘Nub kws mej xyeem thawj phaum qoob loos, thaus mej muab qoob tshab xyeem rua Yawmsaub ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos, yog nub kws mej ua kevcai xyaa lub chib su,  mas mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav hlo le.
Mej yuav muab tej nuav ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog ob tug thaav txwv nyuj, ib tug txwv yaaj, xyaa tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos,
hab muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos xyeem nrug cov tsaj nuav, ib tug txwv nyuj mas muab peb feem kaum huv ib efa,  ib tug txwv yaaj mas muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa,
hab xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj mas ib tug muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa,
hab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai ntxuav kev txhum.

Mej yuav muab tej nuav xyeem hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub muab xyeem ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos moog le. Yuav saib tuab zoo tsw tseev muaj chaw thuaj le.’ ”
“ ‘Lub xyaa hli nub xab ib yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav le. Yog nub kws mej tshuab raaj kub yaaj.

Mej yuav muab tej nuav ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog ib tug thaav txwv nyuj, ib tug txwv yaaj, xyaa tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj xyeem nrug cov tsaj nuav, ib tug txwv nyuj mas muab peb feem kaum huv ib efa,  ib tug txwv yaaj mas muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa,
hab xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj mas ib tug muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem ntxuav mej kev txhum.

Yuav muab tej nuav xyeem tsaav rua tej kws ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua nub hli xab hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej kws naj nub muab ua kevcai hlawv xyeem hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le, lawv le txuj kevcai, kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog yaam kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem rua Yawmsaub.’ ”
“ ‘Lub xyaa hli nub xab kaum mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv hab tswj mej lub sab tsw xob ua ib yaam num le.

Mej yuav tsum muab tej nuav ua kevcai hlawv xyeem rua Yawmsaub kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog ib tug thaav txwv nyuj, ib tug txwv yaaj, xyaa tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw tseev muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos xyeem nrug cov tsaj nuav, ib tug txwv nyuj mas muab peb feem kaum huv ib efa,  ib tug txwv yaaj mas muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa,
hab xyaa tug mivnyuas yaaj mas ib tug muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa,

hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws xyeem ua kevcai xyeem daws txem ntxuav kev txhum hab tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.’ ”
“ ‘Lub xyaa hli nub xab kaum tswb yuav tuaj txoos ua ke ua kevcai dawb huv, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav le, mej yuav ua kevcai noj haus xyaa nub.

Mej yuav muab tej nuav xyeem ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem, yog yaam kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, yog kaum peb tug thaav txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw tseev muaj chaw thuaj le,

hab muab cov moov mog zoo zoo ntse roj kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos xyeem ua ke nrug cov tsaj nuav, kaum peb tug txwv nyuj mas ib tug muab peb feem kaum huv ib efa,  ob tug txwv yaaj mas ib tug muab ob feem kaum huv ib efa,
kaum plaub tug mivnyuas yaaj mas ib tug muab ib feem kaum huv ib efa  xyeem ua ke,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws ob mas xyeem kaum ob tug thaav txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub muab ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem moog le hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem.
“ ‘Nub kws peb muab kaum ib tug txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws plaub muab kaum tug txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws tswb muab cuaj tug txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws rau muab yim tug txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws xyaa muab xyaa tug txwv nyuj, ob tug txwv yaaj, kaum plaub tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tej txwv nyuj hab tej txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.
“ ‘Nub kws yim mej yuav tuaj txoos ua ke caiv su tag tag le, mej tsw xob ua ib yaam num nyaav le.

Tassws mej yuav muab tej nuav ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem yog yaam kws hlawv kub nyab xyeem kuas muaj paa tsw qaab hum Yawmsaub lub sab, mas yog ib tug txwv nyuj, ib tug txwv yaaj, xyaa tug mivnyuas txwv yaaj kws muaj ib xyoos tsw muaj chaw thuaj le,
hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem ua ke nrug tug txwv nyuj hab tug txwv yaaj hab tej mivnyuas yaaj npaum le kws kevcai yuav tsum xyeem,
hab muab ib tug txwv tshws ua kevcai xyeem daws txem tsaav rua tej kws naj nub ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem moog le.

“ ‘Tej nuav mej yuav muab xyeem rua Yawmsaub rua tej kevcai noj haus lawv tej swjhawm kws teem ca, yog xyeem tsaav rua tej kws mej xyeem pauj tej kws mej fev ca tseg rua Yawmsaub lawd hab tej kws mej zoo sab muab xyeem pub xwb hab tej kws ua kevcai hlawv huvsw xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem qoob loos hab tej cawv txwv maab kws laub xyeem hab tej kws ua kevcai xyeem sws raug zoo.’ ”
Mas Mauxe has rua cov Yixayee lawv le kws Yawmsaub tau has rua nwg txhua yaam.
Mauxe has rua cov thawj huv txhua xeem Yixayee tas, “Nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub has kuas mej ua.

Thaus leejtwg yeem cog lug tseg rua Yawmsaub lossws cog lug twv paav nwg tug kheej ib yaam daabtsw mas nwg tsw xob rhuav tej lug kws nwg cog tseg hov, nwg yuav tsum ua lawv le nwg lub qhov ncauj tau has lawd huvsw.
“Lossws thaus ib tug ntxhais hluas twg yeem cog lug tseg rua Yawmsaub hab cog lug paav nwg tug kheej rua thaus nwg tseed ua hluas nkauj nyob huv nwg txwv tsev,

hab leej txwv kuj nov tej lug kws nwg yeem cog tseg hab tej lug kws nwg paav nwg tug kheej, tassws leej txwv tsw has le caag rua nwg, kuj ca tej lug kws nwg yeem hov nyob ruaj hab ca tej lug kws nwg cog lug paav nwg tug kheej nyob ruaj.

Tassws yog leej txwv taav nwg rua nub kws leej txwv nov, mas tej lug kws nwg yeem hab tej lug kws nwg cog lug paav nwg tug kheej hov tsw yom ceev lawm. Yawmsaub yuav zaam txem rua nwg vem nwg txwv tub taav nwg lawm.
“Tassws yog ib tug ntxhais hluas twg yeem cog lug tseg hab tsw xaav txhua es nwg ca le cog lug paav nwg tug kheej lawm, nwg le maav moog yuav quasyawg lawm,

mas nwg tug quasyawg tau nov tej hov, los nub kws nov hov nwg tsw has le caag rua nwg tug quaspuj, tes tej lug kws tug quaspuj hov yeem tseg yuav nyob ruaj hab tej lug kws nwg cog lug paav nwg tug kheej yuav nyob ruaj.

Tassws yog nub kws tug quasyawg nov dheev tug quasyawg txawm taav tes kuj ua rua tej lug kws tug quaspuj yeem lug hov hab tej lug kws nwg xaav tsw txhua es ca le cog lug paav nwg tug kheej hov tsw muaj qaabhau lawm, mas Yawmsaub kuj yuav zaam txem rua nwg.
Tassws tej lug kws tug puj ntsuag twg hab tug puj nrauj twg yeem cog tseg hab tej lug kws nwg paav nwg tug kheej mas tej lug hov yuav nyob ruaj.
“Yog tug quaspuj hov cog lug yeem tseg hab cog lug twv paav nwg tug kheej rua thaus nwg tseed nrug nwg tug quasyawg nyob,
nwg tug quasyawg nov kuas tsw has le caag hab tsw taav nwg mas nwg tej lug yeem tseg hov yuav nyob ruaj hab tej lug kws nwg cog lug paav nwg tug kheej yuav nyob ruaj.

Tassws yog tug quasyawg muab tej lug hov rhuav kuas tsw muaj qaabhau lawm rua nub kws nwg nov lawm tes txhua lu lug kws tawm huv nwg tug quaspuj qhov ncauj yeem tseg hab cog lug paav nwg tug kheej tsw yom ceev lawm. Nwg tug quasyawg tub muab rhuav tsw muaj qaabhau lawm mas Yawmsaub kuj yuav zaam txem rua nwg.
Tug quaspuj txawm yeem cog lug tseg hab cog lug paav nwg tug kheej tswj yuam nwg lub sab le caag lawm los nwg tug quasyawg muaj cai muab ua kuas ruaj khov lossws muab rhuav kuas tsw muaj qaabhau.

Tassws yog nwg tug quasyawg tsw has le caag ib nub dhau ib nub le tes kuj yog nwg ua rua tej lug kws nwg tug quaspuj yeem tseg hab tej lug kws nwg cog lug paav nwg tug kheej hov yuav nyob ruaj, vem nub kws nwg tub nov los nwg tub tsw has le caag.
Tassws yog nwg tub nov ntev lawm nwg le maav muab rhuav kuas tsw muaj qaabhau tom qaab mas nwg yuav rws nwg tug quaspuj lub txem.”

Tej nuav yog tej kaab ke kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe, yog ntswg txug tug quaspuj hab tug quasyawg, hab ntswg txug leej txwv hab tug ntxhais rua thaus nwg tseed ua ntxhais hluas nyob huv leej txwv tsev.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le kuas cov Yixayee moog pauj taub cov Mintee, mas dhau hov koj yuav tau moog nrug koj tej laug nyob.”
Mauxe txhad has rua cov pejxeem tas, “Mej muab cuab yeej ua rog rua mej cov txwvneej ib txha npaaj moog ua rog rua cov Mintee mas Yawmsaub yuav swv mej pauj taub rua cov Mintee.
Mej yuav xaa cov Yixayee ib lub xeem ib txheeb leej moog ua rog.”
Yog le nuav mas puab txhad txhwj cov Yixayee kws suav quas txheeb leej hov, muaj ib lub xeem ib txheeb leej, huvsw muaj 12,000 leej kws muaj cuab yeej ua rog.

Mauxe xaa puab moog ua rog ib xeem mas xaa ib txheeb leej. Pov thawj Ele‑axa tug tub Fineha nrug puab moog hab coj tej pestwj kws swv huv lub chaw pe Yawmsaub moog hab coj tej raaj xyu tshuab txhwj rog.
Puab ua rog rua cov Mintee lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe, hab tua cov txwvneej txhua tug huvsw pov tseg.

Tej kws puab tua hov puab kuj tua tau cov Mintee tej vaajntxwv huvsw, yog Evi, Lekhee, Xuv, Hawj hab Lenpa. Cov nuav yog cov Mintee tswb tug vaajntxwv. Hab puab xuas ntaaj tua tau Npe‑au tug tub Npala‑aa.
Cov Yixayee nteg cov Mintee tej quaspuj hab puab tej mivnyuas coj lug, hab txeeb tej nam paab nyuj hab tej nam paab yaaj paab tshws hab tej hov txhua chaw huvsw coj lug.
Puab hlawv tej lub moos kws cov Mintee nyob hab hlawv tej zej zog huvsw,
hab puab sau txhua yaam kws puab lws hab txhua yaam kws puab txeeb tau tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu coj huvsw moog.

Puab txhad coj tej tuabneeg kws nteg tau hab tej kws lws tau hab txeeb tau huvsw lug rua Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa hab rua ib tsoom pejxeem Yixayee suavdawg rua ntawm lub zog huv lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau.
Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa hab txhua tug kws ua hlub huv cov pejxeem tawm moog tog puab nrau ntug zog.
Mas Mauxe chim rua cov thawj rog kws kaav ib txheeb leej hab kaav ib puas leej kws ua rog lug hov.
Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Mej tseg cov quaspuj suavdawg txujsa lov?
Saib maj, cov quaspuj nuav yog cov kws Npala‑aa qha kuas puab lug ntxag tau cov Yixayee kuas faav xeeb rua Yawmsaub ntawm Pe‑au, mas kev pluj kev tuag txhad tshwm rua huv Yawmsaub cov tuabneeg.
Yog le nuav ca le muab txhua tug mivnyuas tub tua huvsw hab muab txhua tug quaspuj kws nrug txwvneej pw lawm tua huvsw,
tassws tseg txhua tug ntxhais hluas kws tsw tau nrug txwvneej pw caj sa rua mej.

Mej ca le nyob saab nrau lub zog xyaa nub. Mej cov leejtwg tau tua tuabneeg hab mej leejtwg tau kov tej kws raug tua tuag, mas mej yuav tsum ua kevcai ntxuav mej hab ntxuav tej tuabneeg kws mej nteg coj lug rua nub kws peb hab nub kws xyaa.
Mej yuav ua kevcai ntxuav txhua daim tsoog tsho hab txhua yaam kws muab tawv ua hab txhua daim ntaub plaub tshws hab txhua yaam kws xuas ntoo ua huvsw.”
Mas pov thawj Ele‑axa has rua cov tub rog kws tub moog ua rog lug has tas, “Nuav yog txuj kevcai kws Yawmsaub tau has kuas Mauxe ua.
Tej kub, tej nyaj, tej tooj lab, tej hlau, tej tooj dawb hab tej txhuas,

txhua yaam kws thev taug suavtawg, mej yuav tsum muab plhov suavtawg txhad le huv. Txawm le caag los yuav tsum muab cov dej kws ua kevcai ntxuav kev qas lug ntxuav hab. Txhua yaam kws thev tsw taug suavtawg mej yuav muab raus kag cov dej hov.
Nub kws xyaa mej yuav ntxhua mej cev tsoog tsho mej txhad le huv. Dhau hov mej txhad le moog tau rua huv lub zog.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Koj hab pov thawj Ele‑axa hab cov kws ua thawj huv cov pejxeem txhua xeem ca le suav tej kws txeeb tau lug tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu,
hab muab tej hov faib ua ob feem, ib feem rua cov tub rog kws moog ua rog hab ib feem rua cov pejxeem.
Hab yuav rhu ib feem ntawm cov tub rog kws moog ua rog le lug pub rua Yawmsaub, yog rhu ib feem huv tswb puas lug tsw has tuabneeg, nyuj, neeg luav hab yaaj tshws huvsw,
yog rhu ntawm cov tub rog le feem xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub es muab rua pov thawj Ele‑axa yuav.
Ntawm cov pejxeem le feem mas rhu ib huv tswb caug tsw has tuabneeg, nyuj, neeg luav, yaaj tshws, tej tsaj txhu huvsw mas muab rua cov Levi kws saib Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub.”
Mas Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa kuj ua lawv nraim le kws Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe.
Tej hov txhua chaw kws cov tub rog lws tau lug mas cov kws tshuav yog npaum le nuav, 675,000 tug yaaj,
hab 72,000 tug nyuj,
61,000 tug neeg luav
hab 32,000 tug hluas nkauj kws tsw tau nrug txwvneej pw dua.
Cov tub rog kws tawm moog ua rog le feem yog 337,500 tug yaaj,
mas rhu 675 tug yaaj pub ua Yawmsaub le feem.
Cov nyuj muaj 36,000 tug mas rhu 72 tug ua Yawmsaub feem.
Cov neeg luav muaj 30,500 tug mas rhu 61 tug ua Yawmsaub feem.
Cov hluas nkauj muaj 16,000 mas rhu 32 leej ua Yawmsaub feem.
Mauxe muab tej kws rhu lug xyeem pub rua Yawmsaub hov rua pov thawj Ele‑axa lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua.
Cov pejxeem le feem kws faib ntawm cov tub rog kws moog ua rog lug
yog 337,500 tug yaaj
hab 36,000 tug nyuj,
hab 30,500 tug neeg luav,
hab 16,000 tug tuabneeg.
Cov pejxeem le feem Mauxe rhu ib huv tswb caug tsw has tuabneeg hab tsaj txhu pub rua cov Levi kws saib Yawmsaub lub tsev ntaub, lawv le kws Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe ua.
Cov thawj rog kws kaav ib txheeb leej hab cov kws kaav ib puas leej tuaj cuag Mauxe
mas has tas, “Peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe tub txheeb tej tub rog kws peb kaav huvsw lawm, tsw muaj ib tug pluj le.

Peb coj tej kws nyag taug nyag muab tau coj lug pub rua Yawmsaub, yog tej kws xuas kub ua yog paug teg paug npaab, nplhaib, puj cu hab saw, sub txhad le ntxuav tau peb kev txhum ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag.”
Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa txhad le txais txhua yaam kws xuas kub ua nuav ntawm cov tub rog.
Tej kub kws Mauxe ob tug txais ntawm cov thawj rog kws kaav ib txheeb leej hab kaav ib puas leej coj moog pub rua Yawmsaub hov mas nyaav 16,750 sekhee.
(Cov tub rog hov nyag taug nyag muab tau yeeb ncuab tej hov txhua chaw lug.)

Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa txais tej kub ntawm cov thawj rog kws kaav ib txheeb leej hab kaav ib puas leej coj lug khaws ca rua huv lub tsev ntaub sws ntswb ua lub chaw rua cov Yixayee ncu txug qhov kws Yawmsaub paab cov Yixayee.
Xeem Lunpee hab xeem Kas muaj tsaj txhu coob coob mas puab pum tas Yaxaw tebchaws hab Kile‑a tebchaws yog chaw zoo yug tsaj txhu.
Vem le hov xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee txhad le tuaj cuag Mauxe hab pov thawj Ele‑axa hab cuag cov kws ua hlub huv ib tsoom pejxeem mas has tas,
“Athalau, Ntinpoo, Yaxaw, Nila, Hesanpoo, Ele‑ale, Xenpaa, Nenpau hab Npe‑oo,
tej nuav yog lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub tub kov yeej rua ntawm cov Yixayee lub xubndag, yog chaw zoo yug tsaj txhu, mas peb kws yog koj le tub qhe muaj tsaj txhu.”
Hab puab has tas, “Yog tas koj txaus sab rua peb mas thov muab lub tebchaws nuav pub rua peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe ua peb le teej tug. Thov tsw xob coj peb hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog.”
Mauxe has rua xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee tas, “Tswm nyog mej cov kwvtij moog ua rog es ca mej nyob mej tuabywv ntawm nuav lov?
Ua caag mej yuav ua rua cov Yixayee lub sab qaug zug tsw xaav hlaa moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub pub rua puab?
Mej txwv tub ua le nuav rua thaus kuv khaiv puab moog ntawm Khante Npania moog tshuaj lub tebchaws hov.
Thaus puab moog txug lub haav Ekhau hab tau pum lub tebchaws hov lawm puab kuj ua rua cov Yixayee lub sab qaug zug taag tsw xaav txeem moog rua huv lub tebchaws kws Yawmsaub tub pub rua puab.
Mas nub hov Yawmsaub txhad npau tawg rua puab, nwg txhad cog lug tawv has tas,

‘Txhua tug kws tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug kws noob nyoog muaj neeg nkaum xyoo rov sau mas tsw muaj ib tug kws yuav pum lub tebchaws kws kuv cog lug tseg tas kuv yuav pub rua Aplahaa, Yiha hab Yakhauj, tsua qhov puab tsw ua lawv le kuv has kawg sab kawg ntsws,
tsuas yog Yefune kws yog cum Khena tug tub Khalej hab Noo tug tub Yausua txhad yuav pum xwb vem ob tug ua lawv le Yawmsaub has kawg sab kawg ntsws.’

Yawmsaub txhad npau tawg rua cov Yixayee nwg txhad ua rua puab moog moog lug lug huv tebchaws moj saab qhua tau plaub caug xyoos moog txug thaus puab tam tuabneeg kws ua tej kws Yawmsaub pum tas phem hov puam tsuaj taag huvsw.
Saib maj, mej tau hlub lug nyob mej txwv chaw lawm ua ib paab noob mivnyuas txhum hab ua rua Yawmsaub yimfuab npau tawg rua cov Yixayee.
Yog mej faav xeeb tsw ua lawv le nwg has nwg yuav tso puab tseg rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua dua ib zag hab mas mej yuav ua rua cov tuabneeg nuav puam tsuaj taag huvsw.”
Puab txawm lug cuag nwg mas has tas, “Peb yuav ua nkuaj rua peb tej yaaj tej tshws nyob ntawm nuav, hab ua vaaj ua tsev ua moos rua peb cov mivnyuas nyob,

tassws peb yuav coj cuab yeej ua rog hab peb npaaj txhwj ua cov Yixayee ntej moog txug thaus kws coj puab moog txug chaw. Peb tej mivnyuas yau yuav nyob huv tej moos kws muaj ntsaa loog vem yog ntshai tej tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws nuav.
Peb yuav tsw rov qaab moog tsev txug thaus kws cov Yixayee txhua tug tau teb tau chaw ua qub txeeg qub teg.
Peb yuav tsw nrug puab tau saab ntug dej Yalatee nub poob tid ua qub txeeg qub teg, vem peb tub tau qub txeeg qub teg saab ntug dej Yalatee nub tuaj tim nuav lawm.”
Mauxe txhad has rua puab tas, “Yog mej ua le nuav, yog mej coj cuab yeej ua rog moog ua rog taab meeg Yawmsaub,
hab mej txhua tug kws coj cuab yeej hlaa tug dej Yalatee taab meeg Yawmsaub moog txug thaus Yawmsaub lawv nwg cov yeeb ncuab tswv ntawm nwg lub xubndag moog taag,

hab lub tebchaws hov swb hlo rua ntawm Yawmsaub xubndag lawm, mas mej le maav rov qaab lug mej txhad le dim tej lug kws mej cog rua Yawmsaub hab cov Yixayee. Lub tebchaws nuav yuav poob ua mej tug ua mej qub txeeg qub teg taab meeg Yawmsaub.
Tassws yog mej tsw ua le nuav mas yeej yog mej ua txhum rua Yawmsaub lawm ntaag, mej ca le paub tseeb tas mej yuav raug mej lub txem.
Ca le ua tej moos rua mej cov mivnyuas hab ua nkuaj rua mej tej yaaj tej tshws hab ua lawv le kws mej cog lug ca lawd.”
Xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee has rua Mauxe tas, “Yawm hlub, peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe yuav ua lawv le kws koj has kuas peb ua.
Peb cov mivnyuas yau hab peb cov quaspuj hab peb tej yaaj tej tshws hab peb tej tsaj txhu huvsw yuav nyob tej moos huv Kile‑a tebchaws nuav.
Tassws peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe txhua tug txwvneej yuav coj cuab yeej ua rog hlaa moog ua rog taab meeg Yawmsaub lawv le kws koj has kuas peb ua.”
Mauxe txhad le has txug ob xeem hov rua pov thawj Ele‑axa hab Noo tug tub Yausua hab txhua cum tug thawj huv Yixayee cov xeem.

Mauxe has rua puab tas, “Yog xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee txhua tug kws coj cuab yeej ua rog taab meeg Yawmsaub yuav nrug mej hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog es yog lub tebchaws swb mej lawm tes mej ca le muab lub tebchaws Kile‑a rua puab ua puab tug.
Tassws yog puab tsw coj cuab yeej nrug mej hlaa moog, puab yuav nrug mej tau Khana‑aa tebchaws ua puab tug.”
Xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee teb tas, “Yawmsaub has rua peb kws yog koj cov tub qhe le caag tes peb yuav ua le ntawd.
Peb yuav coj cuab yeej hlaa taab meeg Yawmsaub moog rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws, tassws peb tej teb kws ua peb tug ua peb qub txeeg qub teg yuav nyob saab dej Yalatee tim nuav.”

Mauxe txhad muab tej tebchaws nuav rua xeem Kas hab xeem Lunpee hab rua Yauxej tug tub Manaxe xeem ib nraab, yog muab cov Amaulai tug vaajntxwv Xihoo lub tebchaws hab muab vaajntxwv Aus lub tebchaws Npasaa rua puab, taag nrho tebchaws hab tej moos hab tej tebchaws kws nyob ib ncig, yog tej moos thoob plhawv lub tebchaws hov huvsw.
Mas xeem Kas txhad le rhawv tej moos nuav, yog Ntinpoo, Athalau, Alau‑aw,
Athausofaa, Yaxaw, Yaunpeha,
Npenila hab Npehala, yog tej moos kws muaj ntsaa loog, hab puab ua nkuaj yaaj nkuaj tshws.
Xeem Lunpee rhawv tej moos nuav, yog Hesanpoo, Ele‑ale, Khiliyatha‑i,
Nenpau hab Npa‑aa Me‑oo, (ob lub moos nuav yuav txauv dua npe tshab) hab Xima. Puab txauv dua npe tshab rua tej moos kws puab rhawv hov.
Manaxe tug tub Makhi cum moog txeeb tau tebchaws Kile‑a hab lawv cov Amaulai kws nyob hov tswv taag.
Mauxe muab tebchaws Kile‑a rua Makhi kws yog Manaxe tug tub mas nwg moog nyob rua huv.
Manaxe tug tub Ya‑i moog txeeb tau puab tej zej zog txhad le tis npe hu ua Havauya‑i.
Naunpa moog txeeb tau Khenaj hab tej zej zog ib ncig hov, txhad tis npe hu ua Naunpa lawv le nwg lub npe.
Nuav yog tej ntu kev kws cov Yixayee moog thaus puab tawm huv Iyi tebchaws moog ua tej paab tej pawg le kws Mauxe hab Aloo coj puab.
Mauxe tau sau txhua lub chaw kws puab tawm moog ua ib ntus ib ntus lawv le Yawmsaub has kuas moog. Nuav yog tej ntu kev hab tej chaw kws puab tawm moog.

Puab sawv kev tawm huv lub moos Lamexe moog yog lub ib hlis nub xab kaum tswb, yog nub kws puab ua kevcai Hlaa Dhau taag nub tom qaab, mas cov Yixayee tawm moog ua sab luj sab tuab taab meeg cov Iyi suavdawg.
Lub swjhawm ntawd cov Iyi saamswm paam tuag log puab txhua tug tub hlub kws Yawmsaub muab tua huv plawv puab. Yawmsaub kuj rau txem rua puab tej daab.
Yog le nuav cov Yixayee txhad sawv kev tawm huv Lamexe moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Xukhau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Xukhau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Ethaa kws nyob ntawm ntug tebchaws moj saab qhua.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Ethaa tig rov qaab moog rua Pihahilau kws nyob Npa‑aa Xefoo saab nub tuaj hab moog tsuam chaw nyob ze ntawm Mintoo.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Hahilau hlaa huv plawv havtxwv moog txug tebchaws moj saab qhua. Puab moog huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Ethaa tau peb nub mas moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Mala.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Mala moog txug Elee. Ntawm Elee muaj kaum ob lub qhov dej txhawv hab xyaa caum tsob toov laaj mas puab tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawd.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Elee moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Havtxwv Lab.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Havtxwv Lab moog tsuam chaw nyob rua huv tebchaws moj saab qhua Xis.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xis moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Ntaukha.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Ntaukha moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Aluj.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Aluj moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Lefintee, hov ntawd tsw muaj dej rua cov pejxeem haus.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Lefintee moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xinai moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Khilau Hata‑ava.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Khilau Hata‑ava moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Haxelau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Haxelau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Lima.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Lima moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Limoopele.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Limoopele moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Lina.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Lina moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Lixa.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Lixa moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Kehelatha.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Kehelatha moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm lub roob Sefaw.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm lub roob Sefaw moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Halanta.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Halanta moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Mahelau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Mahelau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Thaha.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Thaha moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Thela.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Thela moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Mibkha.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Mibkha moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Hamauna.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Hamauna moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Mauxelau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Mauxelau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Npene Ya‑akhaa.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Npene Ya‑akhaa moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Hauhakika.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Hauhakika moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Yaunpatha.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Yaunpatha moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Aplauna.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Aplauna moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Exi‑oo Kenpaw.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Exi‑oo Kenpaw moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xee (kws yog Khante).
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Khante moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm lub roob Hau kws nyob tebchaws Entoo nrwm teb.

Mas pov thawj Aloo nce sau lub roob Hau lawv le Yawmsaub has rua nwg mas nwg tuag rua ntawd lawm, yog lub tswb hlis nub xab ib xyoo plaub caug suav txwj le nub kws cov Yixayee tawm huv Iyi tebchaws lug.
Thaus Aloo tuag rua sau lub roob Hau hov nwg noob nyoog muaj ib puas neeg nkaum peb xyoos.
Tug vaajntxwv kws yog tuabneeg Khana‑aa kws kaav lub moos Alaj kws nyob ntawm Neke huv Khana‑aa tebchaws nov xuv tas cov Yixayee taug kev tuaj.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm lub roob Hau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Xamauna.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Xamauna moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Punoo.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Punoo moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Aunpau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Aunpau moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Iye‑anpali huv tebchaws Mau‑a.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Iye  moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Ntinpoo Kas.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Ntinpoo Kas moog tsuam chaw nyob rua ntawm Amoo Ntilatha‑i.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm Amoo Ntilatha‑i moog tsuam chaw nyob rua huv tej roob Anpali ze ntawm Nenpau.
Puab sawv kev tawm ntawm tej roob Anpali moog tsuam chaw nyob rua huv lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau.
Puab tsuam chaw nyob ntawm ntug dej Yalatee txwj nrho Npe Yesimau moog txug ncua Anpee Sithi huv lub taj Mau‑a.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe huv lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws,

mej yuav muab cov tuabneeg huv lub tebchaws hov txhua tug lawv ntawm mej xubndag moog, hab muab puab tej txoov daab kws txaug pob zeb ua hab tej txoov daab kws puab nchuav rhuav tshem kuas puam tsuaj huvsw, hab muab tej chaw sab teev daab tsoo puam tsuaj taag huvsw.
Hab mej yuav txeeb kaav hlo lub tebchaws hov hab moog nyob rua huv tsua qhov kuv tub muab lub tebchaws hov pub rua mej ua mej tug.

Mej yuav muab lub tebchaws rhu ntawv faib ua qub txeeg qub teg rua mej lawv le mej tej xeem. Xeem twg coob kuj muab thaaj kws daav rua xeem ntawd, xeem twg tsawg kuj muab thaaj kws nqaim rua xeem ntawd. Leejtwg rhu tau thaaj teb twg kuj ca nwg yuav thaaj teb hov. Mej yuav tau qub txeeg qub teg huv mej tej laug lub xeem.

Tassws yog mej tsw muab cov tuabneeg kws nyob huv lub tebchaws hov lawv tswv ntawm mej xubndag moog mas cov kws mej tso tseg ca nyob hov yuav zoo yaam nkaus le tug saus muag kws chob mej lub ntsab muag lawm, hab zoo le tej xuav paug kws chob mej saab taav, hab puab yuav ua kev ceblaaj rua mej rua huv lub tebchaws kws mej nyob hov.
Mas kuv yuav ua rua mej ib yaam nkaus le kws kuv tub xaav has tas kuv yuav ua rua puab cov hov.’ ”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej txeem moog rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws (yog lub tebchaws kws yuav poob ua mej qub txeeg qub teg, yog taag nrho Khana‑aa tebchaws huvsw),
mej lub tebchaws saab nraag yog txwj ntawm tebchaws moj saab qhua Xee lawv Entoo nrwm teb, hab mej nrwm teb saab nraag yog txwj ntawm Havtxwv Ntsev  kws nyob saab nub tuaj.
Hab mej nrwm teb yuav zos lub dawm roob Akhanpi hlaa moog rua tebchaws moj saab qhua Xee moog txug ncua Khante Npania saab nraag, hab moog txug Haxa‑anta hlaa moog txug Axamoo,
hab nrwm teb yuav zos ntawm Axamoo moog txug tug dej Iyi moog kawg rua ntawm Havtxwv.
“ ‘Mej nrwm teb saab nub poob yuav tau ntawm Havtxwv Luj hab lawv ntug havtxwv hov. Nuav yog mej le nrwm teb saab nub poob.
“ ‘Nuav yog mej nrwm teb saab peg, yog txwj ntawm Havtxwv Luj yuav ntsuag kuas ncaaj moog txug lub roob Hau.
Txwj ntawm lub roob Hau mas mej ntsuag kuas ncaaj moog txug txujkev kws moog rua lub moos Hama, hab tug nrwm teb saab nuav moog kawg rua ntawm Xente,
hab moog txug ncua Xifoo hab moog kawg rua ntawm Haxa‑ena. Nuav yog mej le nrwm teb saab peg.
“ ‘Mej yuav ntsuag nrwm teb saab nub tuaj txwj ntawm Haxa‑ena moog txug Sefaa.
Nrwm teb ntawm Sefaa nqeg moog txug Linpla ntawm Ayi saab nub tuaj, yuav nqeg moog txug kaum Havtxwv Khinele  hab lawv ntug havtxwv saab nub tuaj,
hab taug tug dej Yalatee moog kawg rua ntawm Havtxwv Ntsev.  Nuav yog mej lub tebchaws hab tug nrwm teb kws vej puag ncig.’ ”
Mauxe has rua cov Yixayee tas, “Nuav yog lub tebchaws kws mej yuav tau rhu ntawv lug ua qub txeeg qub teg kws Yawmsaub has kuas muab rua cuaj xeem hab ib nraab xeem,
tsua qhov xeem Lunpee hab puab tej cum hab xeem Kas hab puab tej cum tub tau puab qub txeeg qub teg lawm, hab xeem Manaxe ib nraab los kuj tau lawm hab.
Ob xeem hab ib nraab xeem hov tub tau puab qub txeeg qub teg saab ntug dej Yalatee tim u kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau saab nub tuaj.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Nuav yog cov kws yuav faib lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg rua mej, tej npe yog pov thawj Ele‑axa hab Noo tug tub Yausua.
Koj yuav tsaa ib xeem ib tug kws ua hlub faib lub tebchaws ua qub txeeg qub teg.
“Nuav yog cov kws ua hlub hov tej npe, xeem Yuta yog Yefune tug tub Khalej,
xeem Xime‑oo yog Amihu tug tub Semu‑ee,
xeem Npeeyamee yog Khiloo tug tub Elinta.
Tug kws ua hlub huv xeem Ntaaj yog Yauli tug tub Npukhi.
Yauxej caaj ceg mas tug kws ua hlub huv xeem Manaxe yog Efau tug tub Hani‑ee,
hab tug kws ua hlub huv xeem Efa‑i yog Sithaa tug tub Khemu‑ee.
Xeem Xenpuloo tug kws ua hlub yog Pana tug tub Elixafa,
xeem Ixakha tug kws ua hlub yog Axaa tug tub Pati‑ee,
xeem Asaw tug kws ua hlub yog Selaumis tug tub Ahihu,
xeem Nathali tug kws ua hlub yog Amihu tug tub Pentahee.”
Cov tuabneeg nuav yog cov kws Yawmsaub has kuas faib qub txeeg qub teg rua cov Yixayee huv Khana‑aa tebchaws.
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe ntawm lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau tas,
“Ca le kuas cov Yixayee muab tej qub txeeg qub teg kws puab tau ua puab tug lawm rhu tej lub moos rua cov Levi nyob hab pub tshaav zaub ib ncig lub moos rua puab.
Ca tej moos hov ua puab tug ua chaw rua puab nyob hab pub tshaav zaub rua puab tau yug nyuj yug yaaj yug tshws yug tsaj txhu huvsw.
Tej tshaav zaub ntawm lub moos kws mej yuav tu rua cov Levi hov mas tseg txwj ntawm lub ntsaa loog moog daav le ib txheeb tshwm puag ncig.

Hab koj yuav tsum ntsuag lub moos saab nrau kuas daav ob txheeb tshwm saab nub tuaj, ob txheeb tshwm saab nraag, ob txheeb tshwm saab nub poob hab ob txheeb tshwm saab peg, ca lub moos nyob huv plawv. Nuav yog puab tej moos le tshaav zaub kws ua puab tug.
“Tej moos kws koj yuav pub rua cov Levi mas yuav pub rau lub moos ua moos cawm sav kws mej yuav kheev ca tug kws tua tuabneeg tswv moog nyob, hab yuav pub dua plaub caug ob lub moos rua cov Levi.
Tej moos kws mej pub rua cov Levi huvsw yog plaub caug yim lub moos hab muaj tshaav zaub.

Tej moos kws mej yuav muab rhu huv cov Yixayee le feem hov mas xeem kws coob mej kuj rhu ntau, xeem kws tsawg kuj rhu tsawg. Txhua xeem tau qub txeeg qub teg ntau hab tsawg npaum le caag mas yuav pub tej moos rua cov Levi lawv le puab tau.”
Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe tas,
“Ca le has rua cov Yixayee tas, ‘Thaus mej hlaa tug dej Yalatee moog rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws,
mas mej yuav xaiv tej moos kws cawm sav rua mej, es yog leejtwg tau tua tuabneeg kuas tsw yog txhob txwm tua tes txhad le tau tswv moog rua huv.

Tej moos hov yuav ua tej moos cawm sav rua tug kws tswv tug tsob caub, sub tug kws tua tuabneeg hov txhad tsw tuag ua ntej rua thaus kws nwg tsw tau sawv taab meeg cov pejxeem rua ntawm lub rooj txav txem.
Tej moos kws mej tu ua moos cawm sav hov mas yog rau lub.
Mej tu peb lub moos rua saab ntug dej Yalatee nub tuaj hab tu peb lub moos rua huv Khana‑aa tebchaws ua moos cawm sav.

Rau lub moos hov yuav ua moos cawm sav rua cov Yixayee hab rua lwm haiv tuabneeg hab rua tej tuabneeg kws nrug puab nyob, es yog leejtwg tau tua tuabneeg kuas tsw yog txhob txwm tua tes txhad le tau tswv moog rua huv.
“ ‘Yog leejtwg xuas tej pestwj kws yog hlau ntaus luas tuag mas yeej yog nwg tua tuabneeg mas tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Yog leejtwg txhais teg xuas ib lub pob zeb luj kws tua tau tuabneeg tuag moog ntaus luas tuag, yeej yog nwg tua tuabneeg mas nwg yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Yog leejtwg txhais teg xuas tej cuab yeej ntoo kws tua tau tuabneeg tuag ntaus luas tuag, yeej yog nwg tua tuabneeg mas tug hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg.
Ca tug kws tsob caub tua tug hov ntaag. Tug tsob caub ntswb tug hov thaus twg mas yuav muab tua kag pov tseg.
Yog leejtwg ntxub luas es laam muab luas thawb lossws tog kev muab ib yaam daabtsw laim raug kuas tuag
lossws ua tshawj chim es xuas nrwg muab ntaus tuag, mas tug kws ntaus hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg, yeej yog nwg tua tuabneeg. Thaus tug tsob caub ntswb nwg ca le muab nwg tua kag pov tseg.
“ ‘Tassws yog nwg tsw tau nrug luas ua tshawj chim es ca le thawb luas taamswm, lossws muab daabtsw laim raug luas kuas tsw yog txhob txwm tog kev,

lossws xuas tej lub pob zeb kws tua tau tuabneeg tuag tso moog raug luas tuag lawm vem yog nwg tsw pum kuas luas tuag lawm, tassws yeej tsw nrug tug hov ua yeeb ncuab hab tsw yog nwg txhob txwm xaav ua phem,
mas cov pejxeem yuav tsum tu plaub rua tug kws tua tuabneeg hab tug tsob caub lawv le txuj kevcai nuav.

Cov pejxeem yuav paab tug kws tua hov kuas dim ntawm tug tsob caub txhais teg hab yuav coj tug kws tua hov rov qaab moog nyob huv lub moos cawm sav kws nwg tau tswv moog nyob hov. Ca nwg nyob huv moog txug thaus tug tuam pov thawj hlub kws raug muab cov roj dawb huv laub tsaa lawm tuag tsaiv.
Yog tug kws tua tuabneeg hov tawm moog dhau lub moos cawm sav le kaav xyuam kws nwg tswv moog nyob huv
es yog tug tsob caub ntswb nwg dhau lub moos cawm sav le kaav xyuam lawm tes tug tsob caub muab nwg tua pov tseg los tug tsob caub tsw txhum tsua qhov kws tua hov.

Tsua qhov tug yawm hov yuav tsum nyob huv lub moos cawm sav moog txug thaus tug tuam pov thawj hlub tuag. Thaus tug tuam pov thawj hlub tuag lawd tug kws tua tuabneeg hov txhad tau rov qaab moog rua huv nwg teb nwg chaw kws yog nwg tug.
“ ‘Tej nuav yog tej kaab ke hab tej kevcai kws mej yuav tsum coj ib tam dhau ib tam ib txhws le rua huv txhua lub chaw kws mej nyob.
Yog leejtwg tua lwm tug tuag mas tug kws tua hov yuav raug muab tua pov tseg lawv le muaj timkhawv pum, tassws yog muaj tuab leeg ua timkhawv xwb mas tsw xob muab tug hov tua pov tseg.
Dua le ntawd mej tsw xob yuav tej nqe kws txhwv tug kws tua tuabneeg kws ua txhum txaus tuag le txujsa, nwg yeej yuav raug muab tua xwb.
Hab mej tsw xob yuav tej nqe txhwv tug kws tswv moog nyob huv lub moos cawm sav tassws nwg tau rov lug nyob nwg teb nwg chaw ua ntej kws tug tuam pov thawj hlub tsw tau tuag.

Ua le nuav mej txhad tsw ua rua lub tebchaws kws mej nyob qas tsw huv, vem yog ntshaav ua rua tebchaws qas tsw huv hab tsw muaj ib yaam daabtsw kws yuav ntxuav tau lub tebchaws kws ntshaav lug rua huv lawd tsuas yog tug kws tua hov cov ntshaav txhad ntxuav tau xwb.
Mej tsw xob ua rua lub tebchaws kws mej nyob qas puag tsuas, yog lub chaw kws kuv nyob huv plawv tsua qhov kuv yog Yawmsaub, kuv nyob huv plawv cov Yixayee.’ ”

Cov thawj huv tej tsev tuabneeg huv Kile‑a cum tuaj cuag Mauxe. Kile‑a txwv yog Makhi, Makhi txwv yog Manaxe kws yog Yauxej caaj ceg. Puab has rua Mauxe hab cov kws ua hlub, yog cov kws ua thawj huv txhua xeem Yixayee has tas,

“Yawmsaub tau kuas koj kws yog peb tug tswv muab lub tebchaws rhu ntawv faib ua qub txeeg qub teg rua cov Yixayee. Hab Yawmsaub kuas koj kws yog peb tug tswv muab Xelaufeha kws yog peb kwvtij le qub txeeg qub teg pub rua nwg tej ntxhais.

Tassws yog tej ntxhais hov yuav cov Yixayee lwm xeem tej tub mas puab tej qub txeeg qub teg hov yuav raug muab rhu tawm huv peb tej laug qub txeeg qub teg moog tsaav rua lwm xeem le qub txeeg qub teg kws tej ntxhais moog yuav hov, mas txhad yuav coj qub txeeg qub teg kws peb rhu ntawv tau tawm huv peb moog.

Mas txug xyoo Zoo Sab kws thim txhua yaam rov qaab rua cov Yixayee, tes cov ntxhais hov tej qub txeeg qub teg yuav raug muab tsaav rua huv lwm xeem kws cov ntxhais moog yuav. Tes cov ntxhais hov le qub txeeg qub teg yuav raug muab rhu tawm huv peb xeem le qub txeeg qub teg moog lawm.”
Mauxe txhad has rua cov Yixayee lawv le Yawmsaub kuas nwg has tas, “Yauxej cov tub xeem has raug lawm.
Nuav yog tej kws Yawmsaub has txug Xelaufeha tej ntxhais. Ca puab yuav tug kws puab txaus sab tassws yuav tsum yuav cov kws yog puab txwv xeem.
Mas cov Yixayee qub txeeg qub teg txhad yuav tsw raug muab rhu huv ib xeem moog rua lwm xeem vem cov Yixayee txhua tug yuav tsum tuav rawv tej laug qub txeeg qub teg rua huv nwg xeem.

Hab tej ntxhais txhua tug huv cov xeem Yixayee kws tau qub txeeg qub teg ua nwg tug mas yuav tsum yuav quasyawg rua huv nwg txwv xeem xwb, sub cov Yixayee txhua tug txhad tuav tau nwg tej laug qub txeeg qub teg ca ua nwg tug.
Ua le nuav txhad tsw raug muab qub txeeg qub teg rhu huv ib xeem moog rua lwm xeem, tsua qhov cov Yixayee txhua xeem nyag yuav tuav nyag qub txeeg qub teg ca.”
Xelaufeha cov ntxhais ua lawv le Yawmsaub has rua Mauxe.
Mas Malag, Thilaxa, Haula, Meekha hab Nau‑a kws yog Xelaufeha cov ntxhais puab yuav puab txwv tej kwvtij le tub ua quasyawg xwb.
Puab yuav quasyawg huv puab xeem Manaxe kws yog Yauxej tug tub, mas puab qub txeeg qub teg txhad nyob huv puab txwv xeem moog le.
Tej nuav yog tej lug nkaw hab tej kaab ke kws Yawmsaub has kuas Mauxe has rua cov Yixayee ntawm lub taj Mau‑a ntawm ntug dej Yalatee kws ncaaj lub moos Yelikhau.
